This version is only for tablets with 7" or higher and a minimum resolution of 1024x600. Tactical Futsal is the ultimate experience to improve your tactical knowledge and the best way to apply this knowledge to the sport you love. With our software, specially developed and designed for Futsal coaches is now possible to create, save and load dynamic plays, set balls and prepare training exercises. You are free to move your players around on the screen and draw all the plays using your fingertip. This app also allows to create, save and load unlimited plays, animated or not animated, the choice is yours. Features -User friendly -Lightweight (doesn't slow your tablet or desktop) -Colored lines -Full court or half court -Just press play and show your animated tactical sequences -High quality graphics -Improves the communication between player and team's staff -Substitution manager -Create, save and load your own plays Taking advantage of the best tools that technology has to offer, we created an application that allows the coaching staff to save all the information about the team, the players, and the way that the team plays, yet also allows us to save all the information about our opponents and the way they play. This software can improve the way that the information is transmitted during the game, and also how this information is managed after the game. This software is available in 6 languages (English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Italian and German).

The Owl Pellet - Our first App in the Science Adventure Series! IMPORTANT NOTE: This App has only been tested on Google Nexus Devices. Go on an adventure to find your very own owl pellets to prepare, dissect, and reassemble. Make sure to keep an eye out for the other forest creatures you might encounter that are part of the owl’s habitat. The Froguts Owl Pellet adventure is both an educational and whimsical journey to discover what owl pellets are, where they come from, and how to dissect them. The primary learning objectives are to - Teach How: • habitats are comprised of many creatures. • owl pellet formation occurs within owls. • predators and prey interact with each other. • skeletons are made of many bones, and that they have similar names across animals. • skeletons are put together. • food webs move energy up to the predators. • herbivores, insectivores, carnivores, and omnivores feed. • owl pellets are handled, prepared, and dissected. - Includes Quiz NGSS Disciplinary Core Ideas addressed: LS2.A, LS2.B, LS4.C, LS4.A, LS4.C, LS4.D

If you have a good eye and are fast with puzzles than this game is sure to be for you! In the game of 'Gem Swap II' it is your job to destroy gems by swapping them. The only way gems are able to be destroyed is if they are in rows of three or more gems of the same kind. Time is against you though you must hurry and destroy the gems as quickly as possible in order to advance to the next level! 'Gems Swap II' is an exciting game and you will be surprised on how addicting it is! ★ Swap the gems in order so that they will disappear and you will advance to the next level ★ Auto scaled and optimized to the screen size of your device. ★ Great for phones and tablets. ★ Built using Adobe AIR for best performance. ★ No hidden fees. Play for free.

If you have a good eye and are fast with puzzles than Gem Swap II Premium is sure to be for you! In the game of Gem Swap it is your job to destroy gems by swapping them. The only way gems are able to be destroyed is if they are in rows of three or more gems of the same kind. Time is against you though you must hurry and destroy the gems as quickly as possible in order to advance to the next level! Gems Swap is an exciting game and you will be surprised on how addicting it is! ★ Swap the gems in order so that they will disappear and you will advance to the next level ★ Includes your own personal leaderboard so you can play against your own rank. ★ Built using Adobe AIR. ★ If you have a suggestion or comment let us know! Published by Pulado Games, Inc. in partnership with Fupa.com.

The object of this game is to put all the cards to the foundation (the top 4 piles). The foundation piles must be built up from A to K with cards of the same suit. There are 7 tableau piles (the lower 7 piles). Initially, the cards are dealt here, some of the cards will be covered and some of the cards will be opened. Each time you can move a column of cards from a tableau pile. You can put the column of cards on another tableau pile if the last card of the tableau pile is of different colour and is one point bigger than the first card of the column. When the last card of a tableau pile is covered, you can uncover it by clicking it. When a tableau pile becomes empty, you can drag a K (together with the entire column of cards on top of that K) to fill the position. We bring you this application totally free with the help of search monetization. We have decided to use this to be able to keep making more free apps for you. Please be aware that with our app you will receive a search icon on your device which is easily deleted or replaced. Thank you for downloading!

みんなでドタバタ占領合戦！最新ゲームアプリ「みんなで三国志」！！ 【ゲーム紹介】 ◆壮大な三国志の世界に1人の将軍として参戦！ あなたと英雄との出会いが新たなストーリーとして三国志の歴史に刻まれる！ ◆これぞ！簡単戦略バトル 戦闘は「シミュレーションバトル」だけど「簡単！」 基本的に動かす武将は1人のみ！初心者でも楽しくプレイできる！ もちろん複数の武将を操作することもできるから、より戦略を楽しみたい人も満足のバトル！ ◆自分の領地発展が鍵！ 自分の領地を発展させることがストーリー攻略の第一歩。 様々の施設を建設して味方の武将を成長させよう！ ◆友達との占領合戦がお勧め！ 友達は戦闘の助けてくれるけど…領地を取り合うライバルにも！ お互いの領地を賭けて友達との戦略バトルを楽しもう！ もちろん「連盟（ギルド）」での戦いもできるのがこのゲームの特徴！ ◆お気に入り武将を集めて自分の領地を守れ！ 稀代の英雄からあの人物まで…様々武将が登場！ 雇った武将は自分と一緒に成長させて戦いに挑もう！ さらに！特定の英雄には専用武器まで用意されてるぞ！ みんなでを楽しくプレイすればあなたの活躍に「戦功」ポイントがもらえるぞ！ 「戦功」を積めば誰でも「あの名将」たちを仲間にできるよ！ たくさんのユーザーと楽しく三国志の世界を満喫してくださいね！ -------------------- ジャンル：シミュレーション サービス形態：基本プレイ無料 アイテム課金式 動作環境：Android 2.3(Gingerbread)以上 -------------------- c RHINE GLOBAL CO.,LTD.ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. c GameOn Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved.
release_text: 1）追加機能 ・6ランク武将追加 ・連盟検索機能追加 ・連盟大戦での移動ボタン ・天時符の使用選択機能 ・戦闘時の速度調節機能 ・修練時、召喚石だけを表示させる機能 ・告知バナーから詳細ページへのリンクボタン追加 -------------------- 2）機能変更 ・占領のレベル制限設定（上下3レベル以内） ・名将ガチャ(武将石）の可能回数増加 ・救援時の報酬を上方修正 ・連盟員の最終ログイン時間を表示 ・UI改善 -------------------- 3）その他 ・不具合修正

description: Révisez les difficultés essentielles au CM1 en orthographe d’usage, orthographe grammaticale et conjugaison. Exemples de notions abordées : observation et mémorisation des mots courants différentes écritures des sons, sons inverses débuts et terminaisons des mots, terminaisons en u/ue, oir/oire... consonnes doubles ; accents, cédille et tréma pluriel des noms et des adjectifs ; féminins particuliers mots invariables ; pluriels particuliers (ou, au, eau, eu...) accord du verbe et du sujet homophones grammaticaux (on / ont, ces / ses, ou / où...) ; etc. Dans chaque exercice, vous bénéficiez d'exemples et d'aides pédagogiques précises. Les principales règles d’orthographe sont rappelées en cas d’erreur. Un rappel de cours permet de réviser les différentes notions. Vous progressez à votre rythme et vous suivez l’évolution de vos résultats grâce au bilan personnalisé. Cette application est idéale en soutien scolaire ou pour l'élève qui désire se perfectionner. ORTHOGRAPHE CM1 est réalisé par Génération 5, n°1 français des applications numériques pour l’éducation. De nombreux logiciels de Génération 5 sont « Reconnus d’Intérêt Pédagogique » par le Ministère de l’Éducation Nationale. Review the essential difficulties in CM1 use spelling, grammar spelling and conjugation. Examples of concepts covered: observation and memorization of common words different scripts sounds, reverse sounds beginnings and endings of words, endings u / ue, ee / ory ... double consonants, accents, cedilla and diaeresis plural nouns and adjectives; individual female invariable words, plural individuals (or, in water, in ...) verb agreement and subject grammatical homophones (on / have in / her, and / or where ...) and so on. In each exercise, you have examples and specific teaching aids. The main spelling rules are recalled in case of error. A reminder of course will review the different concepts. You progress at your own pace and follow the evolution of your results through personalized assessment. This application is ideal for school support or students who wish to improve. SPELLING CM1 is made by Generation 5, n ° 1 French digital applications for education. Many software Generation 5 are "Recognized Educational Interest" by the Ministry of National Education.

Fun Maths game that will quickly help teach children their Number Bonds and Times Tables. The App has been tested by our children and their friends and is now being used in many Primary Schools. You can create as few or as many players as you like. You could add the whole class if you like, or just your family at home. Yes the Adults love to play too. Timed games can be hidden for children who do not thrive under the pressure of a timer. You are awarded Stars depending on how well you do in a particular game, of which there are dozens. You can quickly see your all time best score, and your latest score for each game. Number Bonds to 10 are the pairs of numbers, for example 4 and 6 that add up to 10. You can play from as easy as just Number Bonds to 5, or go for Number Bonds to 100. Or mix them all up in one game. The same is true of the times tables. From as easy as the first half of your 2 times tables, up to a mashup of all the times tables and everything in between. The questions are asked in 3 formats to ensure a solid knowledge of each times table. We developed the App for our 6 year old who is learning her Number Bonds and Times Tables at School, although her 4 year old brother loves to play the game too.
release_text: After many requests the timed games can now be turned off for children who don't thrive under the pressure of a timed game. Doubled the number of games. Fixed the missing mute button bug.

description: Beautiful Bride Verna is preparing for her romantic wedding. Come to make an elegant hair style for her. So many pretty choices, try your best to design a perfect one. A charming bride is coming.

Doing wedding hairstyles for brides is very happy. But it's extremely challenging and not easy. OK,let's do a try. As an great hairdresser now you should design the most beautiful wedding hairstyles for the pretty bride as her need and give her the romantic and perfect wedding! It's a very funny hair games for girls and kids! I hope you could enjoy the great hairdresser games!

Brew your own magic potion with Aunty Maggie. First choose one of four characters. Choose the ingredients to add to the cauldron by mixing the colours in the jars to create the colour of your monster. Then see what happens when they drink the potion! Clear targets and multiple choices make this activity suitable for those needing to practice touch accuracy or learning to make choices. It can also be used with single and two switch scanning access using currently available Android switch interfaces. Key Features: • Bright clear graphics on dark background to help users with visual impairments. • Lots of opportunity for discussion and language development. • Simple touch access to practice targeting skills. • Switch scanning using single and two switch step scanning. • Fun bright animated monster rewards.

Developed in conjunction with specialist teachers in the field of visual impairment, the activities have been specially designed for use with children with low vision, including those with cerebral visual impairments and complex needs. High contrast animated images and great sound effects designed to provide visual stimulation and to develop and assess visual preferences. With a choice of three styles of image and a choice of eight basic foreground and background colours, including black and white, these activities are ideal for assessment of picture recognition and colour preferences. They are also excellent visual activities for babies who really respond to the black and white options and sounds. Also includes one and two switch options to provide access for users with motor difficulties who need to use switch inputs. Comprehensive settings options make this a great tool for assessing visual preferences and image recognition offering control of: • Image style - simply choose from one of three styles: silhouette, simple line art or complex line art. • Pick from a choice of 8 background and foreground colours, including black and white. • Choice of up to 21 images in each style with a variety of attention grabbing sound effects and music. • Select suitable reward animation time. • Single touch access for maximum cause and effect. • Touch operated or use with one or two switch inputs (suitable switch interface required). • Use two switch access option to allow users to step through pictures with one switch and then animate the choice by pressing a second switch.

New Award Winning ChooseIt! Maker 3 App allows you to view your cause and effect activities, literacy activities, sound lotto and matching activities, multiple choice activities, games, quizzes and more on the go! Awards Include: BETT Award Winner 2014 - ICT Special Educational Needs Solutions CODiE Award Winner 2014 - Best Solution for Special Needs Students ERA Awards Finalist 2014 - Special Education Resource or Equipment Including ICT The ChooseIt! Maker 3 App includes three sample activities which demonstrate some of the many ways CM3 can be used to create a variety of fun learning activities using symbols, pictures and sounds. Simple presentation, clear recorded sound and a variety of access options makes the CM3 App ideal for a range of students, including those with autism spectrum disorders (ASD), communication difficulties, language impairments, physical and motor difficulties and learning difficulties. ChooseIt! Maker 3 includes: • Download shared activities • Over 15,000 SymbolStix symbols • Over 11,000 Widgit symbols • 5,000 Inclusive Technology pictures and symbols • Option to add your own pictures and sounds • Progression and achievement recording • Switch access options included (using available Bluetooth switch interfaces) Please note that you must have a ChooseIt! Maker 3 account in order to create and download your own personalised learning activities to this App. The app has been designed to work best on tablets but can equally be used on an Android phone.
release_text: • Re-design for new version of ChooseIt! Maker 3 • Activity share-codes

description: Finger Paint with Sounds offers a fun alternative to help children with special needs and others to practice their first interactions with a touch screen. Simply choose a colour and draw with music, fun sound effects or no sound at all. Finger Paint with Sounds offers multi-touch and single-touch options. We suggest that single finger touch is better for some users with special needs as it reinforces finger pointing skills with a purpose rather than encouraging a random whole finger approach (may be difficult to un-learn). Using multi-touch gives a more obvious “cause and effect” activity for some. Try turning off the sound and music to see if the child needs auditory feedback or if they can see and enjoy the visual feedback alone. • Choose single-touch to encourage finger pointing skills. • Choose multi-touch for maximum cause and effect. • Bright feedback for children with visual impairments. • Save your best work to “Gallery”. • Choice of musical or sound-FX auditory feedback or none.
release_text: • Finger presses now create dabs of paint as soon as you touch the tablet's screen. • Disabled the Splash screen from launching the website unless clicking directly on the web-link.

description: Learn the numbers from one to five with this easy to learn counting song. The song and animation stop at the end of each verse and you can use a switch or touch the screen to play the next verse. Clear graphics, which include the numbers and words to sing along with and high quality voice over to encourage correct pronunciation of the number names. The follow-up activities give lots of opportunities to see numbers and hear number names. • Counting up – touch the screen or press a switch to count up to five. • Count along number line – errorless activity using touch or switch to count to five with clear visual and auditory feedback for numbers and number names. • This set of activities is an enjoyable way to help a child become familiar with numbers from one to five. • Works with touch or single or two switch scanning. • Use a switch with any currently available Android switch interface.

Have fun with this counting song whilst learning the numbers from one to five. The song and animation stop at the end of each verse and a simple touch of the screen or press of a switch will continue the counting song (does that tune have a familiar sound?). Clear graphics and sound to encourage correct pronunciation and sing-along with numbers, making this a great activity for all and ideal for children with special needs. Key features: • Sing along to learn the numbers one to five. • Lots of repetition of names and numbers. Includes three follow-up activities: • Counting up – touch the screen or press a switch to count up to five. • Count along number line – errorless activity using touch or switch to count to five. • Counting in sets – find the right number of sharks to get your reward. This set of activities is an enjoyable way to help a child become familiar with seeing and hearing numbers from one to five. It can be used with touch, and one or two switch access using currently available Android switch interfaces. We can assure you that no ducks were harmed in the making of this app!

This activity has been designed to encourage exploration of the whole screen and teach basic touch and drag skills including options for single or multi-touch. Drag your finger around the screen to reveal coloured shapes and patterns, with different sound effects that change pitch. When you lift your finger the tiles will fade. Black background, different sound effects and bright colours make this a very motivating activity for children with visual impairments as well as being great fun for the very young. The great feedback makes this an ideal cause and effect activity that can help develop hand eye co-ordination. Key Features: • Choose single or multi-touch. • Black background and bright colours ideal for low vision. • Single touch to encourage finger isolation and pointing - may be easier for some users to understand. • Multi-touch for maximum feedback. • Simple interaction and fun for very young children.

Help the hungry little penguin find his way home. An easy to play touch and single switch accessible game involving watching and waiting for the right moment to overcome the obstacles including a killer whale, the polar bear and other chilly dangers. Involves watching and waiting with lots of opportunities for discussion and language development. Easy to use with bright clear graphics to make the “right moment” for interaction clear. • Accessible using single switch or touch anywhere on the screen. • Helps users to watch and wait for the right moment to interact. • Learn to watch and wait. • Works with all currently available Android switch interfaces.

Memory Pairs is a simple and accessible “matching pairs” type game, ideal for young children and learners with special educational needs. It has a clear interface for easy touch selection; simply touch the card to turn it over to see the picture and then try to find its matching pair. Memory Pairs can also be accessed using one or two switch scanning. Clear and recognisable graphics from Inclusive Technologys’ SwitchIt! Extra range of software are used, covering a range of interesting and fun topics. Memory Pairs is simple to set up; just use touch or enable one or two switch scanning. Select the number of cards to be displayed, then select from one of the six picture sets and start to play. Touch or scan and select the cards with your switch to see the picture. If you get a match they stay visible and once you match them all you receive a reward. The clear and simple presentation together with the accessibility of this matching pairs game makes it ideal for use with children with special needs. • Play by touch or select one switch or two switch scanning. • Choose to display 4, 6, 8, or 12 cards. • Pick one of the six picture sets: farm, transport, dinosaurs, sports, wildlife or gadgets. • Clear and recognisable pictures for easy recognition. Great for language development. • Interface and switches required for switch access, supports all currently available switch interfaces.

Peeping Musicians has been designed to encourage early looking/observation skills and develop basic touch and targeting skills. Wait and watch for the musician as they ‘peep’ from the top, bottom or side of the screen. Simply touch them to make them move centre stage and play a piece of music. There are 20 different characters and instruments to find. Black background and brightly coloured musicians provide great contrast making this activity very suitable for users with visual and perceptual difficulties. Peeping Musicians is a fun way to help a child to develop hand eye co-ordination and learn to use a touch screen. Key Features: • Black background for maximum contrast with bright rewards. • Minimum distraction - screen blank until musician appears. • Encourage waiting for visual and auditory cue before touching screen. • Develop visual location skills. • Great for listening skills with real and fantasy musicians.

A fun cause and effect activity - look at the pictures and talk about the story in your own words: What can you see in the multi-sensory room? Do you like the bubble tube or disco lights best? Touch the screen to see what happens next. Switch access for one or two switches is included for users with motor difficulties who need switch input (Switches can be connected via a Bluetooth switch interface). Clutter free, bright, clear graphics make it easier for students with visual impairment to see the screen. Key features • Bright clear graphics with bold outlines • Lots of opportunity for discussion and language development • Simple touch access • Switch access options included (using available Bluetooth switch interfaces) • Fun bright animated reward

This app has been designed to help children develop their understanding of a selection of communication symbols showing emotions and feelings by relating them to bright clear animations and fun sounds. Simply touch the symbol or scan using one or two switches to see how Smarty Pants reacts. Used individually or with a group as an excellent way to discuss feelings and emotions. Great fun can be had trying to imitate the sounds and faces shown. This app offers both single and two switch access and can be used with all current Android switch interfaces. Key Features: • Helps children relate to static symbols of actions. • Offers an errorless introduction to switch scanning. • Clear background and high contrast to help users with visual difficulties. • Offers a neutral way to discuss feelings.

Touch the screen anywhere or press a switch to splat the clowns as they move across a target in the middle of the screen, splat five clowns to get a reward. What will you throw this time, ripe fruit, rotten cheese or a custard pie? This accessible and inclusive game has been designed to encourage and develop hand-eye coordination and switch timing skills. Auditory prompts and a clear background with bright objects make this an ideal game for children with visual and perceptual difficulties. Choose the easy level and the clown will wait for you to throw! Switch input is accepted from all the currently available switch interfaces. • Ideal for early hand-eye coordination. • Auditory prompts and clear graphics for users with visual difficulties. • Easy skill level for error-less operation. • Hard level and speed control to increase difficulty. • A fun way to develop switch timing skills and anticipation. • Learn to wait - press too soon and the clown gets away.

Touch the musician to make them jump to the spotlight. Watch them move to centre stage and then entertain with their music. The clarity and bright colours are chosen to appeal to children with special needs, including cerebral visual impairment. This App has been designed to provide visually attractive activities to encourage locating and targeting. With its bright, high contrast graphics and fun musical rewards it is an ideal way to help children with visual and perceptual difficulties develop their hand eye co-ordination. The App provides a choice of levels to encourage more interaction and exploration of the screen to locate the musician. A visual and auditory cue is provided to prompt the user who may be having trouble locating the targets. Switch access for one or two switches is included. Switches can be connected via a Bluetooth switch interface. •Black background for maximum contrast. •Clear presentation with no visual clutter. •Twenty different musicians both real and fictional. •Choose from small or large targets. •Choose from three levels with two, three or five touches to jump to the spotlight on the centre stage. •Switch access options included (using available Bluetooth switch interfaces). •Single switch mode where each press causes a response. •Two switch mode offering a great introduction to two switch scanning. Press switch one to make single jumps to the target and the second switch has to be pressed for the final musical reward.

Train Tracker is a simple but addictive inclusive game for all ages with a great plus – switch access options for single and two switch users. Choose your train and then build a track from a choice of straights, curves and cross-over tiles. Select ‘play’ and your engine and coaches, full of passengers, will steam around your track with great sound effects. Select ‘stop’ to alter or extend your layout. Select the ‘snapshot’ button to add a picture of the current layout to your gallery – enabling you to keep a record of your favourite tracks. Compare them with friends to see who can build the best and biggest layout! The easy to use interface and “snap in place” feature makes Train Tracker an accessible game which will help develop perceptual and planning skills. Switch access options with simplified scanning can be used at a ‘cause and effect’ level as well as allowing the user to build more complex systems. Key features: • Simple, engaging and addictive for all users, not just train fans! • Switch access for single and two switch users. • Snapshot feature to take a picture of your favourite tracks. • Can help to develop thinking, problem solving and perceptual skills. • Compatible with all currently available switch interfaces (See our App Support page for more information). • Runs in landscape mode only.

Abdest Alma ve Namaz Kılma Abdest alma ve namaz kılma uygulaması, bilmeyenlerin kolay bir şekilde öğrenebilmesi yalın bir dille resimli bir şekilde hazırlanmıştır. Abdest alma ve namaz kılma uygulaması ile abdest almayı ve namaz kılmayı kolayca öğrenebilirsiniz. Resimli ve basit anlatımı ile hazırlanan uygulamada öncelikle abdestin nasıl alındığı anlatılmaktadır. Abdest eğitimini tamamladıktan sonra, sorular bölümüne geçerek kendinizi test edebilirsiniz. Test bölümünde size 6 soru sorulmaktadır. Resimli bir şekilde hazırlanan bölümünde, her soru için dört şık verilmiştir. Yanlış cevap vermeniz halinde test yeniden başlamaktadır. Abdest alma bölümünü tamamladıktan sonra namaz eğitimi gelmektedir. Namaz eğitimi kız ve erkek olarak iki farklı şekilde hazırlanmıştır. Namaz eğitimi de resimli ve sade anlatımı ile kolay anlaşılır bir şekilde hazırlanmıştır. Namaz eğitimini tamamladıktan sonra sorulara geçerek bilgilerinizi test edebilirsiniz. Namaz bölümündeki sorular da test şeklinde hazırlanmıştır. Sorulara cevap vererek testi tamamlayıp bilgilerinizi sınayabilirsiniz. Sizi neler bekliyor? *Resimli abdest eğitimi *Abdest alma testi *Resimli erkek namaz eğitimi *Resimli kız namaz eğitimi *Namaz kılma testi *Sade kolay anlaşılır dili Receive daily prayers and ablutions Ablution and prayer practices, the non-swimmers can learn the easy way has been prepared in a manner illustrated in plain language. Ablution and praying with the application you can easily learn to perform ablution and prayer. Visual and prepared with a simple narrative that describes how to get abdestin primarily for practice. After completing the training ablutions, you can test yourself through questions section. 6 questions you are asked in the test section. Prepared in a manner illustrated in the section for each question are given in four stylish. If you give the wrong answer test is resumed. After completing his ablutions section of the prayer comes from training. Prayer education as boys and girls are prepared in two different ways. Prayer training is also illustrated and easy to understand with simple narrative is crafted in a way. After completing his education through prayer questions you can test your knowledge. Prayer is prepared in the form of the test questions in the section. You can test your knowledge by answering the questions test completed. What are you waiting for? * Visual ablution training * Ablution test * Visual men of prayer, education * Visual daughter prayers training * Prayer makes the test * Simple easy to understand language

description: Mobil oyunların bir çoğunda Türkçe seslendirme bulunmuyor. Ama şuan oynayacağınız haber spikeri oyununda birbirinden güzel Türkçe seslendirmeler yer alıyor. Oyunumuzdan kısaca bahsetmek gerekirse; haber spikerine yardımcı olarak sabah ve akşam haberlerini sunmasını sağlıyorsunuz. Haber sunmanın yanı sıra, eğlenceli vakit geçimek için haber spikeri ile çeşitli oyunlarda oynuyorsunuz. İyi eğlenceler. Mobile games not found in most of the Turkish dubbing. But now you can play a newscaster in the game include the beautiful Turkish dubbing. If you need to talk about our game; help newsreader presenting the news in the morning and in the evening you can provide. In addition to presenting news, newscaster for fun with transition are playing in several games. Good fun.

Do you think that you are a good gamer? You haven’t tried the Monster Fish yet, right? Just skip and forget all the games which called HARD! Flappy bird? Haha, don’t be ridicilous! With an assistant guides you with her voice, a unique gaming experience for the girls love make up and dressing games. First chose the girl character, chose the costume you see fit, dress her up and put on make up as you desire. Get ready for the date. But it's not over yet. Then take the boy character and get him ready too as you see fit. Don't forget to shave the beard! :) When the game ends, you'll see two characters on the same screen. Change the background for the date and share the view with your friends on social networks. What are you waiting for? Download and play right now for totally free!

Toe Bouncing game is just for you! Choose your favourite footballer and start bouncing! With the comments of narrator break the record in toe bouncing and have a place on the record list! It may seem easy to play; but beating the record is so hard! Don’t drop the ball onto ground, make it bounce and make the highest score on the top of the list! With joyful comments of the narrator, Toe Bouncing game is much more entertaining! What are you waiting for? Download and play it for totally free!

Aslanlar, Sarı Kanaryalar, Kara Kartallar ve Karadeniz Fırtınasına gönül verenler, Top sektirme oyunu tam size göre! Sempati duyduğun takımı seç, ardından en sevdiğin futbolcuyu belirle ve oyuna başla! Türkçe spikerin direktifleri ile top sektirme rekoru kır ve puan listesinde takımın ile birlikte yer al! Oyunu oynamak çok basit gözükse de en yüksek rekoru yapmak çok zor! Topu yere düşürmeden en fazla topu sen sektir ve puan listesinde zirveye otur! Türkçe spikerin sana ve takımına özel seslendirmeleri ile Top sektirme oyunu çok daha eğlenceli! Hadi ne duruyorsun, hemen ücretsiz indir ve oynamaya başla! Lions, Yellow Canaries, who fell to the Black Eagles and the Black Sea Storm, Top Breakout games just for you! Select the team you sympathize, then select your favorite football player and start the game! Turkish announcer broke the record for a bouncing ball with the directive and takes place in conjunction with the team's score list! Although it seems very simple to play the game very difficult to make the highest record! You bounce the ball without dropping the ball and score maximum apogee in the list! Turkish private voice announcer with you and your team for Top Breakout games much more fun! Come on, what are you waiting, just free download and start playing!

Learning times tables can be fun! With kids multiplication tables app you will learn multiplication tables from one to ten in a very funny way. Soon your kids know the multiplication tables better than you do! If you pass the levels with perfect score, you will unlock access to hidden "Time Challenge" mode. Beautiful hand drawn illustrations combined with great gameplay.

A dreamy painting is with you, after you download our game you will see what you can do with it and get surprised and excited. Let’s come on the subject without lengthening and disquiting you more. Our painting game’s subject is “Princesses” we named our game as Dream of the Princess because you will have paintings like in your dreams and get wonderful pictures when you open and start to play the game and use usefull painting tools and lots of qualities. There are lots of princess pictures in the game. In pictures we dont feature a lot of details on dresses to make you develop your creativity and use your imagination freely. You can also design on dresses by using painting tools like pencils in addition to paint them. By using magic wand in tools palette you can choose flowers, butterflies, roses, hearts,diamonds,necklaces,from objects library and choose the most suitable size according to your design from the window opened on the right and put necklace, earrings, neckband on our princess. You can put wonderful patterns and designs on dresses and enrich them according to your dreams. In pictures we leave background free to make you design it according to your imagination. You can have free and original concepts with painting tools and magic wand. After you finish painting pictures, by clicking on frames icon from tools palette and choosing one of the wonderful frames which we prepared for you, you can put a fresh complexion on paintings you painted. If you dont like the picture, by undoing last actions from tools palette on the right, you can retouch on pictures. You can paint fast wherever you want on the picture by choosing the colour you want and using paint box on tools palette. When you choose pencil tool, you can decide pencil size from opened window and fix clarity. Thanks to this you can have more successful results on pictures. As much as you play our game you will be master in the game and make up on princesses who is waiting for you to colour their world. Our tool bars are so useful that you can zoom in or out pictures by using magnifier tool and have details for example lips’ make up and mascara for eyes. In In this game, by using your drawing talent, you can design dresses and fashion and stay for a long time without getting bored. There is a blank page in the end of the application. You can paint or by using fames thanks to rich drawing tools, you can also prepare celebrating cards for people you love on special days. After you paint pictures in the game, you can share them with people you love by using Facebook icon on the left or also Gmail, Google+ Watsapp, Hotmail, ChatOn sharing buttons which are in the upper menu. As a “HihoyTeam” crew, we make up a principle of preparing educational and enjoyable games to develop children’s physical and mental process for families. We dream of presenting lots of games like this. We wish you fun.

Groceries Made Easy is just that, your grocery lists made easy. This application has all the features you would expect from an ordinary grocery list and more. Features includes • Personalized grocery items • Management of multiple lists • Custom and Sortable categories • Quantity option for all items • Get the estimated total of your shopping trip To save you even more time there is a recipe section. Put in all your favorite meals and have them ready to input directly to your grocery list with the tap of a button. Optimized for Phones and Tablets (Honeycomb, Ice Cream Sandwich and Jelly Bean)
release_text: - Released to Android - Ability to backup and restore data to SD Card - Various bug fixes

description: Shoot Cannonball Monkey out of his cannon to help him capture his fruits, but be careful and don't hit the bombs! Blast your way through 16 levels of game play in this exciting and addicting puzzle game. Be sure to check for future updates periodically for additional levels and game content. Please Note: This is not a game designed for preschoolers or children. The levels in this game progress to difficulties and challenges that are not targeted for kids. There is a preschool version of this game made available for a younger audience named "Preschool Cannonball Monkey".

Confused on what groceries to buy for your Virgin diet? Worry no more, this shopping list provides everything you will need to make your selection at the market a snap. This simple, easy to use and fully editable check list will take the guessing out of which foods and spices are allowed on the Virgin diet. Tip: to modify the list, just do a 'long press' on any category or food item.

Bricks Crush - Brain Puzzle is a free new highscores puzzle game in which you must try to find as many rectangles as you can in 180 seconds time limit! Simple but addicting puzzle game with global leaderboards included! How to play: Tap on 4 bricks on the screen in a way that each brick is a one corner of rectangle. The bricks must be of the same color! Remember, bigger rectangle you find the better score you get! Features: * simple but addicting gameplay * global leaderboards included * great fun for the whole family * 100% free puzzle game with no In-App purchases If you find any bug or if you have any suggestion how to improve the game, please contact us on littlebigplay@gmail.com we will be happy to answer your questions :) If you like the game, please support it by rating it or leaving some comment, it will help us a lot in adding brand new and mainly free features to the game! Don't forget to check out also our other FREE highscores games in our profile. You can also check our fan site at https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay Enjoy playing Bricks Crush :) If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com , we will be very happy to fix it! Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/ Email: littlebigplay@gmail.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay
release_text: - a few minor UI changes and bugs fixes

description: Do you like skateboarding? Then you must try this cool skateboarding game! This is not Tony Hawk but crazy Madpet Half-pipe Skateboarding! Madpet Half-pipe is a cool high-scores skateboarding game with 3 game modes, 5 skateboarders to choose from and many cool skateboarding tricks and combos! How to play: While landed on the half-pipe press and hold the POWER button (left part of the screen) to setup the power, release it after the leaving the half-pipe and do your tricks by pressing the tricks buttons (right part of the screen), after landing the current power will be added to total power. Total power will bring you a higher jump! Practice in free-ride or try 2 skateboarding highscores modes - Challenge or Big Jump! In the challenge mode you must get the stated amount of score to progress to the next level, watch out for timelimit! In the big jump you have one jump with full power to perform the best tricks possible! * addicting skateboarding game * global highscores included * 3 game modes * beautiful cartoon graphics * 100% free full version + no In App purchase What are you waiting for? Grab a skateboard and lets go! A must for all skateboarders! Please rate and leave a comment, if you like the game! Try also my other FREE HIGHSCORES games if you like this one ;) If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com , we will be very happy to fix it! Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/ Email: littlebigplay@gmail.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay
release_text: - a few minor bugs fixed - some UI changes

description: Learn Russian fast and effectively with L-Lingo Russian. Contains thousands of images and native speaker audio. L-Lingo is designed to be easy to use. It exploits multimedia channels - words, recordings of native speech, and pictures - to enable you to grasp Russian words and phrases useful on the road, when mingling with Russian speakers, in day-to-day or family life, and when working. - Thousands of words and sentences -all visualized with images - Grammar Notes - Full native speaker pronunciation - Fun Quizzes - Clear and easy to understand design of the program See a pineapple in a supermarket, and the correct Russian word pops into your head! Thanks to L-Lingo, you have learned the word visually, as well as by listening and reading. Our Russian lessons make you learn Russian words and phrases quickly. Before you know it, you can easily utter Russian words and Russian sentences! L-Lingo immerses you in the sights and sounds of the Russian language, rather than just the written word. The multi-channel Russian learning approach achieves results much quicker than traditional textbook approaches. Our Russian 65 lessons (available in full version) cover the following: - Introductions & Greetings - At Home - At the Airport - At the Hotel - Colors - Food - At the Office - Professions - Numbers - Clothes - Telling the Time in Russian - Animals - Meals and Cooking - Asking Questions in Russian - Buying and Selling - Landscapes and Nature - Weather - Sports - Family and Relationships - Countries and Continents - Seasons - Shopping - Days, Weeks, Months etc. - Quantities and Shapes - Present, Past and Future tenses *** Any problems or have feedback on how to improve the App, email us before negative comment. We will reply quickly. http://smartlanguageapps.com/helpdesk/open.php ***
release_text: Fixed file location of audio and images. Full Version users need to redownload the content. Sorry for the inconvenience.

description: Tonight there is the fashion clothes fall. Our friend enrolled in this presentation and received confirmation this morning that may participate. She had little time to prepare so well and asked us to help her with new clothes and her hair in beautiful, in a modern haircut. We could and painted hair, blonde, brunette or dark blue, but I have especially to help her dress. We can choose evening dresses, long or short dresses or skirts a lot shorter or longer. Have to choose a bag that fits the chosen clothes and put them some accessories, a necklace, a bracelet or pair of earrings. In the end you have to help in the choice of shoes and our job is over. Our friend looks super nice. How to play: Use your finger to play

Being a sunny day we decided to do a shopping spree, and from where we could go shopping elsewhere than at the biggest store in town, namely the Mall. Once inside the mall I noticed many shops with clothes, and we were hard to decide, in the end we turned attention to a clothing store that had some nicer clothes. Once inside the store I tried several models of clothes and dresses, we tried models earrings, sunglasses, shoes, hairstyles and more. Come with me to try to choose the most beautiful clothes. Instructions: Play the game moving your fingers

In the afternoon our friend has a photo shoot and does not want to lose, but it means very beautiful and elegant dress and does not know how to do. Asked me to help her with clothing and accessories but I do not know me very well so please you to help, sure you do a good job. We need to do your hair, choose the necklace was very nice to paint the hair, choose the bag or buy them new, to choose an beautiful dress, to buy her some sunglasses for the day is very warm to him put some earrings, bracelets or chains and a very nice shoes on, in shoes, boots, sneakers or sandals. I hope you're doing because they do not want to lose because of this photo shoot. Instructions: Use your finger to play

This game is the best Chinese Chess game, aka Co Tuong or Xiangqi in the market with amazing graphics, smart computer and awesome features. 6 Play Modes: ♥ Classic: play offline with 10 difficulty levels of Computer, from beginner to expert. ♥ Solve Puzzles: hundreds of fun Puzzles await to be solved. ♥ 2 Players: play-and-pass directly with friends on the same device. ♥ World Tournament: play online with friends and other players all around the world. ♥ Vietnamese Mystery Chess (Cờ Tướng Úp), aka Co Tuong Up or Co Up. ♥ Taiwanese Dark Chess (暗棋), aka Blind Chess (盲棋), Half Chess (半棋) or Banqi. Special Features: ♥ Teach you to play Chinese Chess with Endgame Puzzles, Tactics and Hints. ♥ Multiple Skins and with either Chinese or Western Chess Symbols. ♥ Brilliant interactive User Interface, beautiful graphics and animations. ♥ Ability to show possible moves, unlimitedly Unmove. ♥ Ability to invite friends, share your games via Facebook, Twitter, Sina Weibo. ♥ Google Game Leaderboards and Achievements. Chinese Chess is also known as Xiangqi, Xiàng Qí, 中国象棋, シャンチー, Cờ Tướng, Co Tuong, Cotuong, Asian Chess, Janggi. This game is also designed for Chess, Checker and Mahjong players; you don't need to read Chinese characters, the game can show you the equivalent chess symbols.
release_text: Version 2.6: ♥ New Play Mode: Mystery Chess (Cờ Tướng Úp), aka Co Tuong Up or Co Up. ♥ New Play Mode: Dark Chess (暗棋), aka Half Chess (半棋) or Banqi. ♥ More Puzzles. ♥ More Backgrounds and Skins. description: Happy Halloween! Help a fearless boy to steal all the candy from the castle of evil monsters. Run and jump through dangerous traps, scary zombies and collect as much candy as you can! The easy gameplay makes it one of the simplest yet addictive running games around. You run and jump through different levels. The levels will get harder as you progress in the game. Wach out for different monsters: zombies, zombie hands, bats, pumpkins, flaming skulls etc. FEATURES: - One of the most fun halloween running games - Fun and light hearted graphics - Simple jump, roll and run game mechanics (easy to learn for kids) - Frequently updated (more levels coming soon!) Hello, today we wish to prepare a cake for a friend and because we do not handle we need your help. To prepare this cake you must follow these steps. 1. For the beginning you have to crush the biscuits which must then mix them with the butter and sugar. This combination should be placed in the oven. 2. You still have to prepare the composition, so you have to add cream cheese, flour, sugar caramel will then mix them. After, you have to add vanilla, lemon zest, two tablespoons of caramelized sugar, lemon juice and finally the eggs and then mix the all ingredients. 3. In the third step you have to add the second composition over first and then enter in the oven. Meanwhile you must cut strawberries and put them together with chocolate cream on the cake. For decoration you can use mint. Enjoy!

description: My Little Virtual Pet - your virtual life companion! ✩ Many different pets (bird pets, cat pet, dog pet, horse pet, panda pet, monkey pet, alien pet) ✩ Various stages of evolution with new look ✩ Big shop system ✩ Various causes of death ✩ Drug addiction ✩ Diseases dependent on food + drug use ✩ Various random events ✩ Individual IQ ✩ Clean, feed, entertain and care for your pet ✩ Improve your house, buy a car and collect paintings ✩ Send your pet to school (aged 7-18) ✩ Look for a job (depending on individual IQ, when your pet is 18 years) ✩ App2SD support Unlike many similar Tamagotchi apps, your pet can die . Therefore, it is important that you give him / her some attention and you take care of him / her. The first three stages of evolution are the most difficult. If you survive this phase your pet will hatch. (Duration: 26 minutes) Tip: Try tp keep the level for heating and cooling just before the "hot" or "cold" field. When you go to sleep, you turn the heat lamp on or off accordingly. At the beginning it will be hard to get money (Birdlars). The more you care for your pet, the more money you will earn. At the age of 18 years, your pet can then apply the job center for a profession. This again depends on the IQ and thus of education. A healthy balanced diet and great activities have a direct influence on the development of your birdies. Thus, some elements have an effect on the health and intelligence. The more healthy a pet fed, the less likely it is that he is sick. In real life, drugs have a negative effect on a body. This is not different for your pet. Be careful when dealing with drugs because your pet may be addicted. Play Mini Games: 1. Memory 2. Basketball 3. Birdcopter 4. Catch It 5. Bird Run 6. More real physics games under construction With Google Play Games Service you can compete with your friends. Compare the current balance, the age and the total money earned of your pet with the birdies of your friends and the whole world. Our goal is to program a realistic virtual pet. "The most realistic app when it comes to virtual pets" - Corona ✩✩✩✩✩ "It is something special to have a hatched pet" - K.S. ✩✩✩✩✩ "Required patience and the fact that your pet can die, are unique." - George ✩✩✩✩✩ If you have questions, ideas or suggestions for improvement just send us an email or visit us on facebook: support@nextwebgeneration.de https://www.facebook.com/pages/My-Little-Bird/601402103207269 We will try very hard to implement as many suggestions for improvement. If the ad annoys you, you can remove it in the shop and also support the development. IN DEVELOPMENT: -------------------------------- 1. Casino with mini games 2. Playground with mini games 3. Airport for vacations Have fun with your virtual baby that has his own character.
release_text: ✩ Small bug fixes ✩ Get daily bonus Birdlars We are currently working on new mini games for your little friend. Thanks for the great feedback! We'll try to implement the suggestions as soon as possible!

If you start enjoying various games that help brain activity, your brain will naturally become flexible With the difficulty level of appearing easy but not really, anyone could enjoy this game. Should we put our heads together? go, go~~go~~ [Game Characteristic] ▶ Your brain evaluation with the brain evaluation mode~ Within the given time, you solve 5 areas (logic, perceptive, analysis, memory, calculation)) to measure your brain activity. ▶ The analysis of your strengths and weakness through the brain evaluation results. After brain evaluation, you understand your strengths and weaknesses through the evaluation result, and you could find out the brain training directly as well ~ With explanations and graphs that are easy to understand, we analyze your brain development status and suggest areas to train in the future. ▶ Making a flexible brain in the brain training game mode When playing over 13 types of various games according to logic, perception, analysis, memory, calculation areas, your brain slowly becomes vigorous. ▶ Global game ranking Enjoy fierce competition with global game friends who enjoy the same game ~~ ▶ Continuous new game update Fun games that are helpful to brain activity will be continuously updated.

Cogmed Working Memory Training is an evidence-based intervention for improved attention. Based on the concept of neuroplasticity and with more published research behind it than any other cognitive training program, Cogmed is trusted by healthcare professionals and educators around the world. Cogmed has helped thousands of trainees to improve attention, behavior and academic performance and eight out of ten users report improvements in their working memory after using Cogmed. Now, Cogmed Working Memory Training is available on Android ® devices.
release_text: ‐ We have added the possibility to enable Extended trainings in the Cogmed Coaching Center. ‐ On future updates, previously downloaded graphical and sound resources won’t have to be updated. ‐ The performance of the graph components has been improved by 200%‐700%. ‐ We have added support for Brazilian Portuguese. ‐ Cogmed Trends is updated to version 1.1. ‐ In addition to the updates and changes above we have done over 100 smaller bug fixes and improvements.

description: Over 3500 Russian Words and Phrases. One of the most comprehensive phrasebook available. Are you planning a trip to Russia? Are you living in the country? PhrasePack Russian has been designed to help you interact with the locals. From ordering food in a restaurant, asking for directions or to be in an emergency, this app helps you to be understood by the locals in many situations. HIGHLIGHTS + FREE Version already contains more than 1000 phrases! + Upgrade to access 3500+ Russian phrases + High quality recordings from native speakers + Choose between male and female voices + Switch between formal and informal language + Add commonly used phrases to your favourites + Search for specific words + No Internet Connection required PhrasePack's specially designed sentence builder allows you to construct your own sentences without the need to look up for additional words. You need a plane ticket to Moscow? Select the base sentence and the location and PhrasePack will build and speak the complete sentence automatically. Are you ready for a quiz? Try PhrasePack's Russian Language Quiz and learn some essential phrases in a fun way! CATEGORIES All phrases and words are easily accessible within our categories or you can use the simple search function. PEOPLE - Conversations - Hobbies & Sports - Communication - Romance - Weather TRAVEL - Getting around & Cities - Border & Airport - Countries & Languages - Directions & Places - Accommodation FOOD & DRINKS - Food and Local Dishes - Drinks - Restaurant - Spices SIGHTS & SHOPS - Tourist Attractions - Shopping - Purchase & Bargaining - Colours HEALTH - Emergencies - Pharmacy and Hospital TIME & NUMBERS - Days & Months - Time & Appointments - Numbers PhrasePack is developed by a team of language learning experts with ten years of experience in developing language learning software. GET IN TOUCH PhrasePack is continuously being developed and we love hearing from you. Please send us your feedback, suggestions and comments to  support@phrasepack.com . If you like this app, please give us a rating!
release_text: Bug fixes Add your own phrases with audio (in full version)

description: This app will help healthcare students and professionals to develop and consolidate their drug calculations skills. The topics covered by the app follow a flexible simple-to-complex sequence of calculations starting with the basic solid and liquid calculations and calculations with different units to the more complex calculations of drug percentages and drip and infusion rates. Within each topic there are worked examples showing you how to perform the calculations, which are followed by interactive exercises to enable you to practice your skill. Each topic finishes with a mini-quiz to enable you to self-assess your ability to perform the calculations. The topics can either be accessed in order from start to finish or on their own if only a refresher is needed.

Песневорот — это словесная игра для меломанов. Вам будут загаданы отрывки из песен, в которых каждое слово заменено на обратное ему по смыслу. Надо заменить все слова на их «антонимы» и угадать песню. Мы подготовили более сотни интересных и забавных загадок. Скучно точно не будет! Следите за новостями и пишите отзывы: - Вконтакте http://vk.com/pesnevorot - Фейсбук http://facebook.com/pesnevorot - Твиттер https://twitter.com/pesnevorot Pesnevorot - it's a word game for music lovers. You will zagadannoy excerpts from songs in which each word is replaced by its inverse meaning. It is necessary to replace all the words on their "opposites" and guess the song. We have prepared more than a hundred interesting and fun puzzles. Definitely will not be bored! Follow the news and write reviews: - FaceBook http://vk.com/pesnevorot - Facebook http://facebook.com/pesnevorot - Twitter https://twitter.com/pesnevorot

description: Do you keep finding leftovers in your refrigerator that you forgot you cooked? Do you go to the grocery store and buy something only to find that you already bought it last week? Do you skip purchasing something because you saw it in your fridge, only to find out once you get home that it has already expired? If any of these scenarios describes you, then this application is for you. What's In My Fridge allows you to enter any number of refrigerators (from garage to kitchen to office) and add any kinds of food items to the refrigerator or freezer sections. The red visual indicator makes it easy to see when a food item is about to expire.

description: SAFARI Montage® Live-5! (SML5) is now mobile! SAFARI Montage Live-5! is the ideal solution for providing reliable school-to-school or school-to-home education for a wide array of applications, including AP classes, distance education for homebound students, professional development for teachers at school or at home, and virtual field trips to remote locations. The SAFARI Montage Live-5! for Android™1 app works in conjunction with the school district’s SAFARI Montage Live-5! server to bring interactive videoconferencing directly to Android phones and tablets, allowing districts to enable educators to connect and collaborate with colleagues and students like never before — easily and affordably. SAFARI Montage Live-5! for Android offers many of the features available in the desktop version, optimized and streamlined for a mobile experience.  Mobile SAFARI Montage Live-5! attendees enjoy high-quality, multi-point video conferencing and, depending on session privileges, support for: mobile video broadcasting with full duplex audio; viewing of shared media and screens; access to chat, shared notes, whiteboards, polls and session recordings; inviting others to a conference; changing session layout; and managing the privileges of other attendees. HOW TO JOIN A MEETING Once you've downloaded the free app, there are several easy ways to connect to a session: • Tap the session link on your SAFARI Montage dashboard • Tap the session link in an email invitation • Open the app, click "Join Session,” and enter the URL of the session. Then connect as a guest or as a registered user. AUDIO If broadcasting, we highly recommend the use of a headset, such as the standard headset provided with your device, to ensure a pleasant experience. REQUIREMENTS: •         SAFARI Montage Live-5! v5.4.2.1+ Server •         Android Device: o    Android 2.2, 2.3, 3.0, 3.1, 3.2, or 4.0 o    ARMv7 processor with vector FPU, minimum 550MHz, OpenGL ES 2.0, H.264 and AAC HW decoders o    256MB of RAM o    Adobe AIR 3.5 o    Android Browser •         Connection: o    Wi-Fi or 4G required for videoconferencing o    3G recommended for use with audio-only conferencing SUPPORT: Please visit SAFARI Montage Support @ http://www.safarimontage.com/support/ .

description: This hidden object game is now available on your Android phone and tablet The beloved Sherlock Holmes story, The Norwood Mystery comes alive in this richly illustrated junior version hidden object game complete with audio narration. The game helps young kids learn to read by increasing their vocabulary skills. Enjoy playing this game with the new magnifying glass feature to zoom in on objects more easily, especially useful when playing on your phone. Sherlock Holmes once again faces another mystery about a strange crime that takes place in Norwood...but who is the criminal behind it? That is the question Holmes seeks to answer. Based on the Oxford University Press edition of Sherlock Holmes: The Norwood Mystery, this hidden object puzzle game features stunning art and stimulating puzzles designed by award winning game producer SecretBuilders. Each brain-teasing level unfolds a scene from the book with beautiful illustrations and audio excerpts. • Audio narration and book scene illustrations in each level! • A fun and enjoyable way for kids to fall in love with literature • Helps young kids learn to read by increasing their vocabulary • Magnifying glass feature to zoom in on those hard to find objects • Many gorgeous levels with scenes from the book packed full of items • Two modes of play, find by picture or by word • Award-winning audio and illustrations from Oxford University Press
release_text: Now available on your Android phone! Enjoy playing this game with the new magnifying glass feature to zoom in on objects more easily, especially useful when playing on your phone.

★★★ "Playing with success" (spielemiterfolg.de) names "Coloring Smart" the #1 coloring app for kids ★★★ Not like existing programs, "Coloring Smart" is perfectly suited for your child to improve in various skills. Your child will love to color entire 36 beautiful drawings in 3 different game modes: ---------------------------------- ✽ teaching numbers ✽ teaching shape recognition ✽ teaching mental calculation Kids love coloring. So why not excite your little ones with a positive and creative mobile app? The friendly and intuitive touch interface is easy to use by all ages, in any language. Tested by kids, approved by parents. Why will kids love this app? ✔ Cute and fanciful images to enrich a child’s imagination. ✔ Choose from a total of 36 images in 6 exciting categories. ✔ Discover hidden pictures by playing. ✔ Change colors with a finger touch. Why will parents love this app? ✔ Kids can spend hours coloring and enjoying themselves. ✔ Kids will improve their hand-to-eye coordination. ✔ Kids will learn to recognize animals, birds, and many other things from the pictures provided. ✔ Kids will develop basic mathematical and geometrical skills by playing. ✔ Kids will develop an interest in drawing and painting. ✔ Kids will do their first steps in the digital world within a controlled setting: no colors spilled on the floor or stained walls any more :-) Features: ✔ 36 beautiful colorful illustrations in 6 categories included! ✔ Categories: Nature, Animals, Transport, People, Fairy Tale and Seasons. ✔ Intuitive interface that has been tested and refined with children of many ages. ✔ Best for kids between 3-8 years. ✔ Wonderful music and atmospheric sounds enhance the experience. ✔ No more frustrating finger-painting: just touch an area to fill it with color. ✔ Touch locator improves touch accuracy. ✔ Supports all devices with any screen resolution with min. ARM7 (ARM8 and up) cpus ✔ No banner advertising ✽ ✽ ✽ What do parents think of this app? ✽ ✽ ✽ "Fantastic" (*****) This app is by far the best value in available coloring apps. Unlike many other apps, this one is very well made. Easy to use, well designed interface - kids figure it out without any help! There's countless drawings of various difficulty levels. Last but not least: we've used it for weeks and the app has not crashed a single time! Thanks for your fantastic notions emailed to us so far. Please continue to email us your ideas on how we can improve "Coloring Smart". Our email address is support@smartkidsplaying.com . Thank you sincerely. This game is part of our "Learning is fun" educational game collection. Visit our website to get more information: http://www.smartkidsplaying.com

DinosaurDays is an animated learning tablet app for kids aged 5-11 and can be used at home or at school, individually or in a group. Each short animated film about these mysterious, ancient creatures goes into detail about how they lived, what they ate, how they developed and how they were discovered. We look at the three ages of the dinosaur era – the Triassic, which was when the first dinosaurs appeared, around 220 million years ago, the Jurassic, when the biggest land creatures roamed the earth and the Cretaceous which was around 65 million years ago, the last phase with some of the most interesting dinosaurs we know about. Also, we learn about fossils: what they are, how they are formed and how they are dug up again. We learn about evolution, which is how dinosaurs – and all creatures for that matter - change over time. And we learn about paleontology, which is the study of fossils and the history of life on earth. DinosaurDays contains extensive material for teachers and parents. Each dinosaur has a factsheet, which can be downloaded, and each time period or study area has a downloadable worksheet. Teachers have access to worksheets, quizzes, glossary and the bibliography as well as a teacher’s guide to using the material in the classroom, or for the home.
release_text: This is the FREE app version, providing a taste of the full version. The full version can be found here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.theapptrain.dinosaurdays.cover

*DESIGNED FOR ANDROID PHONES, for the tablet version, please download "Eggy 100 HD". Reading Eggs Eggy Words 100 is a FREE application designed to help children recognise and learn sight words. Sight words are words that readers should know automatically “at sight”, such as he, the, was and where. This is a sample version of what is featured in Eggy Words 250. You will receive access to the first 100 of 250 sight words using a fun and motivating game to keep kids learning. Also available in the app store - Reading Eggs Eggy Words 250 includes 10 levels with 25 words each, making a total of 250 sight words. Learning to read is an important milestone in every child’s life. Knowing these sight words makes fluent reading easier, which lets the brain focus on the real enjoyment of reading – comprehension – understanding and enjoying what you read. Eggs Words is brought to you by the team behind the popular educational website Reading Eggs. Developed by educators with more than 20 years experience, the program comes highly recommended by parents and teachers worldwide. Key features: - 4 levels with 25 words in each, making a total of 100 sight words. - Fun and motivating game suitable for children aged 3+ years - Most common, highest frequency words are introduced first - Multisensory approach - combining voice and written words - Choice of accents – Australia, English, United States - Flying eggs with the correct word to be swiped - 3 lives per level - Lives are lost when bad eggs, distractions and wrong words are swiped - Mini eggs provide extra lives - Jigsaw eggs build a surprise jigsaw - The word is spelt at the end of each lesson - Egg ratings to be earned for every level - Egg critters with unique animations hatch at the end of a level - Bonus level with 100 golden eggs - Trophies earned for completing 25 levels Please note- Not supported on Thompson tablets. “This is a wonderful app for learning sight words. My daughter loves it!” “ Just like with Reading Eggs, my son uses this app independently all the time and finds it fun to play.” “A motivational game to help your child remember their sight words.”

Make new animals in Switch Zoo by switching the heads, legs and tails of 28 diverse animals. Designed for Android tablets. Features include: • Randomizer - Make unexpected animals from a random selection of parts. • Shake New Animals – Just shake your tablet to trigger the Randomizer. • My Switcheroos - Name your favorite new creatures, write stories about them, and save them in your own collection. • Animal Profiles and Fast Facts - Learn interesting facts about all the animals in Switch Zoo. • Photo Workshop – Snap a photo of your animal and it will display in the photo workshop where you can write a title and story, or display facts with the photo. • Animations and surprises – Switch Zoo features animated transitions, sudden changes, and surprises, like baby animals. It’s simple to make your own “switcheroos” by clicking the animal buttons on the fence, so Switch Zoo is perfect for young players who haven’t learned to read yet. Older children and adults can read the animal profiles and fast facts to learn about the animals that make up their fantastic new creatures.

Keep your passwords and other private information safe and secure with Vault Password Manager. Store all your usernames, passwords, URLs and notes in an AES encrypted database protected by one master password with this digital wallet. In this digital age, we practically do everything online- work, study, network with people, handle finances, shop and so on. And with almost every “www” comes a login and a password. Remembering all this data for multiple websites can be quite a nerve-wracking task and you probably find yourself tapping the “Forgot Password” button a little too often! Vault could make your password management a whole lot simpler and highly secure. Vault is an intuitive, secure and feature rich password keeper that simplifies management of all your confidential and sensitive information related to websites, email accounts, cards, bank accounts, etc. Vault uses a strong data encryption standard and comes with features such as "Auto Destruct" and "Auto Logout" so you are guaranteed that your data is safe. Even the UI has been designed to make it easy for you to access your data and keep it safe from prying eyes. BENEFITS: - One-stop password manager to store all your private information related to banking, credit cards, email and websites. - The data you store on this password manager is completely secure and encrypted using industry standard 256-bit AES Encryption. - All your private information is available at your fingertips and can be accessed anytime with this password keeper - Access your data using a single master pass lock pattern which makes it easier to remember and quicker to input. FEATURES: - Information on this password manager can be stored under five predefined categories: Websites, Banking, Credit Cards, Email and Other. - No limit on the number of records that you can save under each of the categories. - Extremely secure storage for passwords, usernames, PINs, credit card info and other details using 256-bit AES encryption. - User-enabled Auto Destruct feature which wipes out your data after 5 invalid login attempts. - User-enabled Auto Logout feature automatically logs off the application when idle. - Password Generator tool to create strong hack-proof passwords. - Password Strength Indicator. - Copy to clipboard functionality for each field and clear clipboard feature to erase the data after using. - URLs can be launched from this password keeper in your browser with just one tap. - Inbuilt search to find a record quickly by searching in title, URL, account or username. Updates in V1.2: • Ability to add your own custom categories • Backup your Vault data using your Dropbox account • Restore your data from Dropbox in case of a device failure or Auto Destruct • Import data from your KeePass XML Files (v1.x & v2.x) So now, you don’t have to store all your passwords in a diary, spreadsheet or in your head. Safeguard your most confidential information using Vault and rest assured that your secrets are safely locked inside. VAULT – PASSWORD MANAGER FOR TABLETS IS OPTIMIZED TO WORK ON TABLETS THAT SUPPORT ADOBE AIR RUNTIME AND MINIMUM SCREEN RESOLUTION OF 1024x600.

description: Blast all bubbles by triggering a shock wave chain reaction. Find your way through each level by popping the right bubbles that will cause the biggest chain reaction and blast all remaining ones. The simplicity of this logical puzzle makes it extremely fun and incredibly addictive challenge for bubble blast fans of all ages. To solve the puzzle you need to blast all the bubbles with as little taping as possible. But be careful and plan your strategy wisely, as even one wrong tap could ruin your game. When a bubble is tapped, it sends shock waves in four directions. Those waves could pop another bubble, causing a chain reaction effect that will help you clear each level within the taps that you are given. **** FEATURES: - 350 puzzling levels that will challenge you for hours - Special hints to help you solve the puzzle - Cool graphics and sound effects **** HOW TO PLAY: To clear a level you need to pop all bubbles on the screen with a well-planned chain reaction. 1. Pop the green bubble to make a chain reaction 2. The red one needs 2 hits to burst 3. The yellow one is even stronger and takes 3 taps/hits to pop 4. The orange is the strongest one and has to be hit 4 times to burst Follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ZaribaLtd Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/ZaribaLtd Follow us on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/ZaribaLtd Visit our website: http://www.zariba.com

Try for FREE, full version -- 66% OFF Sale -- TODAY: April 21-27, 2015 Let's come and play with me! The best-selling toddler app, Abby Magic Laptop (Kids Phone Games), arrives on Android! This user-friendly wonderful Abby's Magic Laptop for Preschool and Toddlers welcomes you to the colorful world of exploration and learning! This adorable learn and play laptop teaches children names and recognition of LETTERS, NUMBERS, COLORS, SHAPES, ANIMALS, TOYS, FRUITS, VEGETABLES, MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS, and more. The application Kids Phone Games was developed by an award-winning education studio, 22learn, the creator of the best-selling Abby Basic Skills app in cooperation with educational experts to ensure the application is suitable for this very special age category. RECOMMENDED AGE CATEGORIES: Baby, Toddler, Preschooler, Kindergartener Kids will love switching between categories. Actions lead to learning! ================================ * 12 Educational Learning Categories (2 in free version) * 160 Interactive First Words Objects (30 in free version) * 2 Engaging Game Modes ================================ Kids phone games application offers you the possibility of choosing from 12(!) thematic categories. Children will be thrilled to play with this laptop and learn new things. The numerous buttons on the laptop invites to exploration and enable children to determine their own pace of learning according to their individual needs. ***** Kids Phone Games = 12 Educational Learning Categories***** ✔ Farm Animals ✔ Toys ✔ Vehicles (full version only) ✔ Zoo Animals (full version only) ✔ Colors (full version only) ✔ Letters (full version only) ✔ Numbers 1-10 (full version only) ✔ Numbers 11-20 (full version only) ✔ Shapes (full version only) ✔ Fruits (full version only) ✔ Vegetables (full version only) ✔ Musical Instruments (full version only) The laptop includes two game modes: 'Let's Play!' and 'Let's Learn!' The switching between the modes is made easy by two large red buttons. Children typically do not experience problems learning to activate these two modes, but in case they do, we encourage parents to switch the mode for their children. Kids Phone Games: ★Let's Play!★ The 'Let's Play!' mode is designed primarily for children unfamiliar with the objects included, or those who want to refresh and enhance their knowledge of the already acquired vocabulary. To activate the mode, simply press the 'Let's play!' button, and choose a desired thematic category from one of the blue buttons in the upper half of the gaming space. For instance, after pressing the blue button with a picture of a ball, there are going to appear buttons with toys theme on the lower half of the gaming screen. When pressing the individual picture buttons then, the pictures are going to appear enlarged on the laptop monitor, the pronounced name and the written form of the word as well as its authentic sound and small animation follows afterwards. Kids Phone Games: ★ Let's Learn!★ Do you want some practice too? Don't forget to try the 'Let's Learn!' mode! To activate this mode, tap on the 'Let's Learn' button. Afterwards, choose one of the twelve thematic categories and let the challenge begin! When the category has been selected, an enthusiastic monkey Abby appears on the laptop monitor and gives tasks to a child. The task is always to select the picture of the correct item that she pronounced. Of course, after each correct answer, the cute monkey provides words of praise and encouragement. To make the laptop more engaging, we also included four colorful buttons in the lower half of the game screen. These simulate the functions of a videophone and include such funny effects such as entertaining sound effects and melodies. Thank you for selecting our app Kids phone games! We sincerely hope your children will enjoy it! Your 22learn team!

Musical Puzzles in a musical toy for babies and toddlers developed by an award-winning educational studio, 22Learn. The application features six activities that foster children’s creativity, motor skills, and appreciation of sounds and music. AGES 2-8. OVERVIEW - LEARN to differentiate and match sounds - EXPLORE the sounds of different musical instruments - CREATE your own melodies and record them - PLAY with the instruments and engage in several matching games - LISTEN to several popular childhood classics such as Old MacDonald SIX ENGAGING ACTIVITIES 1) Animal Piano - Play the piano. Record your music. Listen to childhood classic melodies, including Old MacDonald, Twinkle Twinkle, Bingo, Five Little Monkeys, and Alphabet Song. 2) Matching sounds (full version only) - Match the same sounds. 3) Xylophone (full version only) - Make a xylophone puzzle. Then, play the xylophone, listen to a melody, or record your music. 4) Drums (full version only) - Which child wouldn’t want to be a drummer? Enjoy the drum beats. 5) Music Machine (full version only) - Drag the sound marbles onto the music machine to explore sounds and make your own music. 6) Super Music Machine (full version only) - More instruments, more machines, more fun! Musical Puzzles was extensively tested with preschool children to ensure its design is as simple as possible and children can explore the application independently. We hope your kids will love it!
