app_name: I Can Write ABC kids alphabets
description: "I Can Write" is what your kids will say! "I Can Write" is a fun way of teaching your child the Alphabet and Number set. This educational game comes with colorful eye catching graphics which teaches not only the correct way of writing A-Z but also recognize letters and numbers. Each Alphabet has a clear pronunciation in a cartoon voice with a small funny jingle to add more excitement. The audio teaches correct phonetic sound of each Alphabet. Covers also the "Aabaakada" style of phonetics. The whole app is designed to be a virtual play garden of Bees who collect flowers on an Alphabet board. Child needs to trace the entire letter in a pre-defined correct path from one tiny flower to another. Its an intuitive way of traditional "join-the-dots" book to write the entire Alphabet. The honey bee doesn't move if the child draws an incorrect path and shows a correct flag if the child is successful in tracing the entire alphabet. Features: * Choose from A-Z in upper case and lowercase. * Choose from 0-9 number set. * Clear Audio of the Alphabet with Phonic Sound. Example: "A as "aa"(The sound for 'aa') for Alex or Apple" * Paint Palette to choose the marker color * Animated Garden theme which has animated butterfly, rabbit, bird. * 4 different styles of honey-bee to choose from. * Excellent Colors and illustrations.

In Fling Away, you must finish levels by collecting stars then landing in a target zone. The closer the ball is to the center of the zone determines the end score. Complete 20 beta levels. Compete with other people in the world with online highscores and more! This game is still in progress, so it would be helpful to get feedback on what people like and dislike about it. Please Comment or send me an email if there is a change that seems needed. Features: -20 awesome starting levels...and many more to come! -stars with animation -portals -spring boosts -neat sound FX System Requirements: -android 2.2 (Froyo) or above -high performance device (700MHz or more) -Adobe AIR (Installs automatically if not already installed) Enjoy! and please give Feedback!
release_text: - Added star points to levels menu - Better performance on most devices - Online High scores - A bunch of small tweaks to the game play

developer: Montessori preschool learning games - Kids Academy
description: Kids Academy · 123 Tracing educational app. Handwriting and Math Drill in Motion. Baby, Pre-K, Toddlers, Preschool and Kindergarten children learn digits through fun Montessori play activities: numbers spelling blocks, flash cards, patterns, memory games Our app is an action-packed app that teaches kids numbers with engaging game that keeps them glued to the screen. Your little learners will have tons of fun learning their numbers in the interactive app loved by kids and parents alike. This math game teaches fundamental math concepts critical for preschoolers: identifying numbers; one-to-one number correspondence; reading number symbols; associating symbols with quantity etc. Appropriate hints are provided to support your child as they practice and build their math skills. Not only can they discover numbers through initial independent play, you can also play collaboratively with your child. FEATURES * Game that make learning numbers a blast! * Kid-friendly navigation * Frequent repetition designed to help children learn numbers and their sequence * Fun surprises and verbal encouragement that keep kids coming back for more * Curriculum developed and reviewed by preschool education expert * A rich, exploratory environment filled with surprises * Audio instructions * Kid-tested appropriate game Why you'll love it: * Active learning: children learn by "doing," completing a fun activity for every number. * Strong educational content: playtime turns into productive learning, keeping children occupied while teaching them the numbers they need for math. 123 Tracing with its unique graphical styling, beautiful music, and interactivity is designed to engage, entertain, and educate your kids.

Наглядно-дидактическое пособие предназначено для использования на уроках математики в 1 классе. Оно позволит повысить наглядность изучаемого материала, разнообразить формы учебной деятельности, вовлечь детей в активный познавательный процесс. Содержание программы разработано в соответствии с требованиями Федерального государственного образовательного стандарта начального общего образования и может использоваться с любой линейкой учебников, входящих в Федеральный перечень. Пособие включает набор из 10 электронных плакатов, в наглядной и доступной форме представляющих правила русской грамматики: • Состав числа • Точка, луч, линия • Равенства • Неравенства • Многоугольники • Компоненты сложения • Решение задач • Компоненты вычитания К каждому плакату разработаны интерактивные тестовые задания, которые помогут закрепить и проверить уровень знаний учащихся. Издание можно применять как в качестве демонстрационного пособия при фронтальной работе с классом, так и в качестве материала для самостоятельной познавательной деятельности учащихся. Особенности программы: • Реализация требований современных образовательных стандартов • Возможность применения в аудиториях с демонстрационной техникой (интерактивная доска, проектор и белый экран) и в компьютерном классе • Специальный режим для увеличения любых фрагментов плакатов • Инструмент «Чертежник», позволяющий делать подписи и рисунки поверх демонстрируемого материала • База тестов (40 интерактивных тестовых заданий) с функцией проверки ответов Visual-didactic manual is intended for use in mathematics lessons in one class. It will increase the visibility of the material being studied, to diversify the forms of educational activities, involve children in active learning process. The program content is designed in accordance with the requirements of the federal state educational standard primary education and can be used with any line of textbooks included in the federal list. The manual includes a set of 10 electronic posters, in a clear and accessible form representing Russian grammar rules: • Composition of the number • The point beam line • Equality • Inequalities • Polygons • Components of addition • Problem Solving • Components subtraction Each placard designed interactive test items that will help to consolidate and check the level of knowledge of students. The publication can be used both as a demonstration grant on the front work with the class, and as a material for independent students' cognitive activity. Features: • Implementation of the requirements of modern educational standards • Can be used in the classroom with the demo appliances (interactive whiteboard, projector and white screen) and in the computer lab • Special mode for enlarging any fragments posters • Tool "draftsman", which allows to make signatures and drawings on top of the demonstrated material • Base Test (40 interactive test items) with the function testing of responses

Pray the POWER of God’s Word in your loved ones’ lives. You will have 100+ prayers derived directly from the scripture to pray specifically for an individual or group by name. You will find prayers divided into topics such as Love, Salvation, Safety, Purpose, Deliverance over Discouragement, and many other subjects. -------- JUST ADDED -------- Prayers For Healing Victory Over Discouragement ---------------------------------- How it works: 1) Customize with the prayer with specific names of your loved ones. 2) Adjust the way you address God. 3) Choose the topic you have a heart to pray for specifically. 4) The scriptural prayer is generated so that you can take the word of God praying. There is a beautiful peace that touches your soul when you pray God’s word over your loved ones. It will touch your heart and bless their lives because God’s word shall not return void. We hope this app will be a blessing to you and your loved one. We also hope you will it use it to also pray for us and the ministry of the Good News Community Church. Grace & Peace to you for Jesus! jim

description: Play Baby Hazel Naughty Cat game on your android device for free. Baby Hazel loves her pet cat, Katy very much, Help Hazel to take care of Katy, by giving her a bubble bath. Then dress up Katy with costume and accessories. Keep Katy happy by feeding and playing with her. Happy time with Naughty Cat.

After the successful launch of The Phrasal Verb Machine, comes Phrasalstein, the definitive app to help you lose your fear of the horrifying phrasal verbs once and for all. This time around, our star is Doctor Phrasalstein who, with the help of his friends, will teach us 100 phrasal verbs using animations inspired by the classic “horror movie” genre, with a touch of humour and irony. You can find 60 of the 100 total animations in this first version of the App. The rest will be along soon in the next update and the App will, of course, continue to be free. Frequently, phrasal verbs have more than one meaning. For the examples we’ve selected, we’ve used the most common and well-known meaning for some while going with the more obscure meaning for others. In any case, you’ll always find an example sentence in English as well as other meanings whenever they are useful or necessary. What’s more, you’ll be provided with the translation in Spanish, German, Italian, Russian and French. If you liked The Phrasal Verbs Machine, we’re sure you’re going to love Phrasalstein. Have a “terrorific” time losing your fear of phrasal verbs!

Phone Story is an educational game about the hidden social costs of smartphone manufacturing. Follow your phone's journey from the Coltan mines of the Congo to the electronic waste dumps in Pakistan through four colorful mini-games. Compete with market forces in an endless spiral of technological obsolescence. You can keep Phone Story in your favorite device as a reminder of your impact on this world. All revenues from the sale of this app will be donated to organizations working to solve the issues mentioned in this game.

If you want to work as a doctor of pets now is your chance. In this game of veterinarians, not long ago you've opened a clinic specialized in small animals and you have to prove that it is the best in town. Put them on the table, they will be examined, and then you must take them again with their owner. You must to keep the clinic clean, seems easy, but you'll see that the game is more complicated in each level. In Halloween and Christmas... veterinary clinic changes!

"Radioapans banankalas" är en app för barn från Sveriges Radio. Det är dags att fixa banankalas i Sagoskogen. Häng med! Radioapan är Barnradions blåa maskot och en riktigt apig kompis. Han bor i en trädkoja i Sagoskogen och älskar radio och ljud. Radioapan samlar ljud i burkar, spelar banjo och sjunger sånger tillsammans med kompisarna Tassa och Emmot. I Radioapans banankalas kan du: * Baka tårta och dekorera den som du vill. * Mata Radioapan och hans kompisar - men vad gillar de egentligen? * Blåsa upp ballonger med Blåsfisken. * Måla vimplar med Emmot och dekorera kalaset. * Tända lampor i en labyrint med Eldflugan. * Laga Radioapans radio så att det blir musik på kalaset. * Ge ljudpaket till Radioapan och kompisarna. * Leka kurragömma med Tassa och hitta skogens djur. Du kan också följa med till Radioapans lyssningshörna och höra hemligt bra sagor och sånger från Barnradion. "Radioapans banankalas" är anpassad för de yngsta barnen med stora tryckytor och mycket ljud och animationer. Även den som inte kan läsa kan leka och ha kul med Radioapan. Appen passar också bra att använda tillsammans. Appen är framtagen i samarbete med barn och noga testad så att den ska vara både rolig och lätt att använda. Fokus ligger på lek och att alla barn ska kunna lösa de olika momenten i sin egen takt. Den härligt färgglada grafiken känner du igen från Radioapans webbplats hos Sveriges Radio. Där kan du också höra fler program från Barnradion och leka och spela mer med Radioapan (sverigesradio.se/radioapan). "Radioapans banankalas" är gratis och det finns inga köp inne i appen. Hemligt välkommen på banankalas med Radioapan! Om Sveriges Radio: Sveriges Radio är ett företag i allmänhetens tjänst – ett public serviceföretag. Sveriges Radio är den reklamfria och oberoende radion med uppgift att göra kvalitativt innehåll av alla slag för hela Sveriges befolkning. ---Observera--- Appar som är spelliknande kräver ofta telefoner och surfplattor med snabb processor och ordentligt med minne. Det gäller även för "Radioapans banankalas". Det här är vad vi rekommenderar för att appen ska fungera bra: - Telefon eller surfplatta med Android 2.3 och uppåt. - Telefon eller surfplatta med snabb processor och ordentligt med minne. Appen fungerar på fler fabrikat och modeller än exemplen ovan. Men om du har en telefon med långsammare processor eller lite minne blir också appen långsammare. "Radio Monkey banana party" is an app for kids from Swedish Radio. It's time to fix banana party in Fairytale Forest. Join! Radio Monkey's Child Radio blue mascot and a really apig friend. He lives in a tree house in Fairytale Forest and loves radio and audio. Radio Monkey collects sounds in jars, playing banjo and singing songs with their friends and Tassa Emmot. In Radio Monkey banana party, you can: * Bake the cake and decorate it as you like. * Radio Feed The Monkey and his friends - but what do they really mean? * Blow up balloons with pufferfish. * Paint pennants with Emmot and decorate the party. * Light bulbs in a maze with Firefly. * Bake Radio Monkey radio so it will be music at the party. * Provide audio packages to Radio Monkey and friends. * Playing hide and seek with Tassa and find the animals of the forest. You can also go to the Monkey Radio listening area and hear the secret good stories and songs from the Children's Broadcasting. "Radio Monkey banana party" is adapted for the youngest children in large print surfaces and very sound and animations. Even those who can not read can play and have fun with Radio monkey. The app is also suitable to use together. The app was developed in collaboration with children and carefully tested so that it will be both fun and easy to use. The focus is on the play and that all children should be able to solve the various stages at their own pace. The wonderfully colorful graphics, you'll recognize from the radio Monkey website of Swedish Radio. You can also hear more programs from Children radio and play and play more with Radio Monkey (sverigesradio.se/radioapan). "Radio Monkey banana party" is free and there is no purchase inside the app. Undercover welcome party at the track with Radio Monkey! If Sveriges Radio: Sveriges Radio is a company in the public service - a public service. Sveriges Radio, the commercial-free and independent radio with the task of making quality content of all kinds for the entire Swedish population. --- Note --- Apps that are similar games often require phones and tablets with a fast processor and plenty of memory. It also applies to the "Radio Monkey banana party." This is what we recommend for the app to work well: - Phone or tablet with Android 2.3 and above. - Phone or tablet with a fast processor and plenty of memory. The app works on more brands and models than the examples above. But if you have a phone with a slower processor or some memory also becomes app slower.
release_text: Nu finns det 10 nya apiga sagor och sånger att lyssna på! Gå till trädkojan och klicka på tavelramarna med stjärnor. När du laddat hem sagorna och sångerna finns de i appen och du behöver inte ha uppkoppling för att lyssna. Vi har också gjort flera förbättringar av appens stabilitet. description: UR Play erbjuder UR:s program där och när du vill. Appen öppnar urplay.se i telefonens eller plattans webbläsare. Där kan du bläddra och söka bland våra program. När du startar ett program kommer en dialogruta upp där du väljer att spela upp programmet med hjälp av UR Play-appen. UR (Sveriges Utbildningsradio AB) är ett fristående public service-bolag som driver Kunskapskanalen tillsammans med SVT och sänder i SR:s och SVT:s kanaler. UR:s uppgift är att bredda, förstärka och komplettera andras utbildningsinsatser. UR Play offers UR's programs where and when you want. The app opens urplay.se the phone or pad browser. There you can browse and search through our programs. When you start a program, a dialog box will appear where you can choose to play the program with the help of UR Play app. UR (Swedish Educational Broadcasting Company) is an independent public service company operating Kunskapskanalen with SVT and sends the SR's and SVT's channels. UR's mission is to broaden, strengthen and complement other training.

Are you still confused with complicated traffic signs? Here’s the solution! This game collects more than 101 common traffic signs. You’ll become a traffic sign expert after passing the test designed for you! ★ Characteristics ★ - 15 difficulty levels: At a tense rhythm, you’ll have to stick your eyes to the screen! - Common US traffic signs are collected, so you can use this game as a drill practice before taking the written tests for driving licenses. - Explanations of traffic signs are provided, so that you can browse them anytime you want to solidify memory. - Your game score is uploaded to Game Center, so you can compete with users from all over the world.

The Virginia SOL Lesson Planner is a tool that teachers in the state of Virginia can use as a lesson plan book, a formative assessment gradebook, and a place to keep track of how many times they have used the SOL in their lesson plan books throughout the year.

Fatburner Diäten setzen auf die Eigenschaft bestimmter Lebensmittel das Fett in den Körperzellen zu verbrennen. Bestimmte Vitalstoffe wie Vitamine, Fruchtenzyme, Hormone und Mineralstoffe in exotischen Früchten kurbeln den Stoffwechsel an und optimieren so die körpereigene Fettverbrennung. Neben einer fettreduzierten Kost werden also Obst und vor allem Südfrüchte wie Papaya oder Ananas konsumiert. Die Schauspielerin Sigourney Weaver setzt schon seit Jahren auf die Enzyme in Ananas, die zusätzlich den Alterungsprozess verlangsamen sollen. Nahrungsergänzungsmittel wie Apfelessig-Kapseln oder L-Carnitin, sowie ein entsprechendes Sportprogramm sollen den Erfolg noch greifbarer machen. Genrell klingt die Idee sogar im Schlaf Fett zu verbrennen sehr verlockend. Vorteile der Diät Viel Obst essen ist immer gut. Auch Mischkost sorgt für eine ausgewogene Ernährung. Nachteile der Diät Die Fatburner-Theorie klingt logisch und verlockend, da sie kaum Entbehrungen abverlangt, entbehrt jedoch leider jeglicher wissenschaftlicher Grundlage. Die angeblichen Schlankmacher-Enzyme aus Ananas oder Papaya können theoretisch gar nicht im Fettgewebe wirken, da sie - wie alle Eiweiße - bereits im Magen durch Säure und Verdauungsenzyme aufgespalten werden. Außerdem raten Ärzte von Nahrungsergänzungsmitteln und Pillen mit angeblichen Fatburner-Eigenschaften ab, da diese leider keine Wunder bewirken können: Pektine im Apfelessig senken die Blutfettwerte nicht nachweisbar und der rote Pu-Erh-Tee kann ebenfalls keine Fettpolster wegzaubern. Von sämtlichen Pillen und Präparaten wie Hormonen, welche angeblich günstig den Energiestoffwechsel beeinflussen, raten Wissenschaftler und Ärzte ebenfalls dringend ab, da die unerwünschte Nebenwirkungen haben können. Fat burner diets rely on the property of certain foods burn the fat in the body cells. Certain nutrients such as vitamins, fruit enzymes, hormones and minerals in exotic fruits boost your metabolism and optimize the body's fat burning. In addition to a low-fat diet that is mainly fruits and tropical fruits such as papaya or pineapple are consumed. The actress Sigourney Weaver has for years on the enzymes in pineapple, which should also slow the aging process. Dietary supplements such as apple cider vinegar capsules or L-carnitine, and an appropriate exercise program designed to make the success even more tangible. Genrell the idea sounds even while sleeping to burn fat very tempting. Benefits of diet Eat lots of fruit is always good. Also mixed diet provides a balanced diet. Disadvantages of the diet The Fat Burner theory sounds logical and tempting as it would barely privations demanded, but unfortunately lacks any scientific basis. The alleged slimming enzymes from pineapple and papaya can theoretically not affect the fat tissue, because they - are broken down in the stomach acid and digestive enzymes - like all proteins. Doctors also recommend dietary supplements and fat burner pills with alleged properties as they unfortunately can not work miracles: pectin in apple cider vinegar do not lower blood fat levels detected and the red Pu-erh tea can also wipe out any fat. Of all the pills and medicines such as hormones that affect the supposedly low energy metabolism, scientists and doctors also advise strongly against, as may have unwanted side effects.

Enter name and it will be converted to Egyptian hieroglyphs. Converted image can be saved to folder Hieroglyphs on SD Card. (Menu->Save image) Some simple rules: -The conversion is only approximate. Only one sign and few two sign hieroglyphics are used. -Numbers are ignored. -Space between words is ignored -Max 30 letters Ad supported.

Z aplikacijo "Teletekst " je možno z enostavnim vmesnikom pregledovati teletekst televizije RTV Slovenija. Aplikacija "Teletekst " deluje v ležečem (landscape) položaju. Potrebuje dostop do interneta.

Personal Weather Station for Cumulus software. It includes Widgets (4x2 and 2x1) and app. Widget uses shorter txt file and sunbird.txt for location. You should have 3 files on server: xml file (example: realtime.xml) txt file (example: realtime.txt) for widged location file sunbird.txt for widget (optional for sunset and sunrise) xml and txt file should have same filename. Icon is valid for wetter forecast from Wetter Station and is not Current weather. Languages (translations): - English - Czech - French - Slovenian - Italian - Danish - Spanish - Norwegian - Swedish If you want to translate to your language, let me know. If you have problems, please let me know. If you need some other feature, please let me know.

description: WiFi Name shows you basic informations about current WiFi connection. It shows following informations about connected WiFi network: SSID (name) BSSID MAC Link speed Signal strength AP Capabilities IP Address Netmask Gateway DHCP Server DNS Server Also includes simple WiFi toggle widget (1x1). Switch WiFi On/Off with 1 click. Please email me with any bugs/problems/feature requests. I cannot reply to market comments.

description: This application allows you checking the nutritional food value of those most common foods. This is useful for someone who follows a low-carb/Atkins diet and often needs to check the carb value. No internet connection is required. Around 1000 common foods are included. The data is originated from the US Department of Agriculture.

Alkitab Bahasa Melayu Alkitab atau Kitab Injil adalah kitab suci penganut agama Kristian. Alkitab dibahagi kepada dua bahagian utama: Perjanjian Baru dan Perjanjian Lama. Bahagian-bahagian utama ini disebut "Perjanjian" kerana Tuhan bangsa Israel atau Yahweh membuat perjanjian. Kali pertama di antara Musa dengan orang Yahudi dan kali kedua antara Jesus Christ dengan seluruh umat manusia. Malay Bible Bible or Bible is the holy book of Christians. The Bible is divided into two main parts: the New Testament and the Old Testament. The main parts are referred to as "the Agreement" for the nation of Israel or Yahweh God made a covenant. The first time of Moses to the Jews and the second of Jesus Christ to all mankind.

One touch HD Camera. Take a pic with just one touch. ★What is QuickShot? When it comes to Cameras on phones there has always been one major drawback when trying to take a spur of the moment, once in a lifetime picture. The drawback being that by the time you had got your phone out your jeans pocket (no easy task in itself) unlocked the screen, loaded the app and pressed the shutter button the moment had passed. However, there is hope with the ultimate phone camera app, QuickShot HD. This app is the perfect way to capture those once in a life time moments. Once the app is installed, you simply add the icon to your homescreen and get ready. Now when the moment arises all you need to do is point your phone in the right direction and click the icon on your homescreen and the picture is saved to your gallery. Take a QuickShot without turning on the camera or leaving the home screen of your phone. ★How does QuickShot Work? The photo that you click will be in the best possible silent photo taking mode of the camera. If you you don't mind the shutter sound, change it from 'QS Settings' in the app drawer. ★How do I use QuickShot? Just touch the icon for QuickShot or QuickShot Auto and wait for the photo to be clicked in High Definition! (Higher the quality, longer it takes to click the photo.) ★★★Features★★★ ★ One touch Camera ★ High Def(available in the settings) ★ One touch Auto shoot mode(press back or home button to stop Auto shoot.) ★ Auto Focus ★ Face-detection Mode ★ Enable/Disable Auto Focus ★ Silent Camera ★ Various resolutions ★ Vibration feedback on photo clicked ★ Front and Back Camera Support. ★ Front and Back Camera separate resolution support. ★ Hide the clicked photos. Reviewed as "THE ULTIMATE CAMERA APP" by AndroidPIT Amazing reviews from the likes of PhoneArena, makeuseof.com, Droid-Life, AndroidPit, Androcid and many more! Capture the Most Beautiful Moment - Editor Picked by AppEggs.com Featured in top paid apps from the day of release and is still the number 1 app for top new paid apps in Photography category! Initial release. If you find any issues, please contact us. We'll fix it or refund you! Don't down- rate the app please. Contact us with issues. Silencing of the camera depends on the location and manufacturer of device. In some cases it is not allowed to silence the camera. Cheers! If you are looking for Camera, Quick Camera, Fast photo, Quick Photo, Quick Camera, Quick Photograph, Quick Cam, Quick Photography, Fast Burst Camera, Burst Shot, Camera Burst mode, Quick Burst Camera, One Click camera, One touch Camera, Camera Widget, Spy Shot Camera, Quick Pic etc. this is the right app for you!
release_text: Thank you for the mails regarding the issues! v2.0.2 . Minor Bug Fixes. . Speed Improvements v2.0.1 . New feature: Face Detection mode added for AutoShot mode! Available from preferences. . New method to calibrate shutter speed that varies from phone to phone. Thus making the app faster. . Bug Fixes. . Supports Android 4.2 now!

description: Приложение Банкноты России позволит пользователям получить справочную информацию о более 700 банкнотах, выпущенных центральным правительством, начиная с 1818года, посмотреть изображение банкноты в высоком разрешении, а также отслеживать количество и состояние банкнот. Реализована возможность экспорта различных списков в excel. Предусмотрена возможность поиска предложений банкнот в интернет магазине. Для удобства редкие банкноты выделины желтым фоном, а раритетные - красным. Пользователи смогут ознакомиться с приблизительной стоимостью банкнот. Программа позволяет производить резервное копирование для переноса на другое устройство. К банкнотам можно оставлять собственные пометки/комментарии. С помощью приложения "Банкноты России", вы всегда сможете быстро и точно оценить ценность банкноты попавшей к вам в руки. Ваша коллекция, теперь всегда под рукой! В базовой версии для ознакомления с функционалом доступен только раздел с банкнотам России с 1992года. В приложении присутствуют рекламные блоки от AdMob, автор не несет ответственности за их содержание. description: ***You must have a Cellcontrol Trigger and Subscription for the Cellcontrol application to work. If you do not yet own a Cellcontrol Trigger goto: http://cellcontrol.com Cellcontrol is the world's leading technology for fleets and families that want to stop distracted driving. The award-winning Protection HaloSM technology eliminates the temptation to talk, text, email and surf the web while driving and is available for all vehicles ranging from compacts to tractor/transport trailers. Cellcontrol is compatible with over 1,000 mobile handsets across all the leading domestic and international mobile service providers, as well as all current release MS-Windows business and ruggedized laptops.

"Easy Blacklist" will block unwanted calls and (or) Sms. It is intuitive, easy to use and very powerful. It combines the functionality of similar applications and presents them in a simple and understandable way. In addition, it is characterized by the ease of use and practicality, for example: to each contact in blacklist is associated two icons (call and sms), one click on the icon allow or not calls and (or) Sms from this contact. Adding contacts to the blacklist can be done from: your contact list or call log or sms log or manually. You can block calls from contacts in the blacklist or block all calls, or receive all calls and (or) block private or unknown calls. The same thing for SMS. You will never lose any important call or sms, every blocked call or sms is saving in the history of the application, with the possibility to call or send sms from the history or viewing the blocked sms. In short, full of features to discover and to enjoy in use. Features: - BlackList numbers (block incoming calls and (or) sms) - History of blocked calls and sms - Block call from private and unknown numbers (anonymous) - Notification or not of the blocked calls and sms - Block all incoming calls, and (or) sms - Receiving all incoming calls and (or) sms - Call Blocking is done by ending the call or put the phone in silent state. - ………… If you have a suggestion or do you like to have a new feature in the future release, please let us know by e-mail: dreamappstudio@gmail.com

Kuizi përmban kërkesa (pyetje) të tipit të mbyllur, me zgjidhje të shumëfishta, me katër alternativa, nga të cilat vetëm njëra është e saktë. Kuizi përmban 120 kërkesa (pyetje) nga lëndët e përgjithshme: 1.Gjuhë shqipe 50 kërkesa 2.Gjuhë angleze 40 kërkesa 3.Matematikë 30 kërkesa Lexoni me kujdes kërkesat (pyetjet) e pastaj shënoni vetëm njërën nga katër përgjigjet që konsideroni se është e saktë. Çdo pyetje e saktë vlerësohet me një pikë (1), ndërsa çdo pyetje e pasaktë vlerësohet me zero pikë (0).

One Media SNES Emulator is one of the most advanced Super Nintendo / Super Famicom (スーパーファミコン) emulators for Android devices, it is specially optimized to run such old-school JRPG's as Final Fantasy, Chrono Trigger, Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior), Breath Of Fire and other SNES games at top performance. Our simple goal is to make sure that you can still play retro games from the 80’s and the 90’s! You will love One Media SNES Emulator! With One Media SNES Emulator, you can play your favorite games, the way they were meant to be played One Media SNES is packed with a whole lot of neat features, such as network co-op and multiplayer using wi-fi or bluetooth, fast forwarding, state saving, cheat support (Game Genie), shortcuts to games, support for archived ROMS (.zip, .7z) .smc , .smw, etc. One Media SNES Emulator Features: ★ Original SNES engine ★ Fast emulator with best game compatibility ★ Auto-detects games ★ Play hundreds of SNES game ★ Continuous play across devices available ★ Excellent support for external controllers ★ Advanced layout editor for on-screen controls ★ In-game walkthrough/guide integration ★ Turbo mode available ★ Ultra-fast support ★ Support for many ROM and compressed file formats ★ High compatibility ★ Virtual On-screen keypad ★ Smooth sound ★ Cheats (Game Genie/Pro Action Replay) ★ High quality rendering ★ Search game files in SDCard & Internal Storage ★ Zipped file support ★ Save States ★ Customizable keys ★ Turbo SNES buttons ★ Wiimote/Gametel/MOGA/Bluetooth controller support ★ Multi Touch (run and jump at the same time) ★ Keyboard/Gamepad controller supported (Wiimote, SixAxis, etc) ★ Up to 5 player support (game pads) ★ Custom key bindings ★ Play your favorite vintage games ★ Move and resize the touch input controls to your liking! ★ Compressed archives (*.7z, *.zip) ★ Custom ROM directory, RomFetcher support How to use One Media SNES Emulator Copy your favorite Roms (that you obtained legally) to your external storage. This directory will be created on first run. You can also set a custom rom directory in One Media SNES Emulator settings. If you have any question or concern, please send us an email at: support@oneconnectionmedia.com One Media SNES is Xperia PLAY compatible, controls can be mapped to the hardware buttons from the settings menu With One Media SNES Emulator, you will play your favourite SNES / Super Famicom games. Just download your favorite game that you are legally allowed to have on your android device and then you can play! Note: No ROMs are included with One Media SNES, in order to get ROMs you will need to dump your original SNES game, search the internet for guides on that. One Media SNES Emulator Disclaimer: One Media SNES Emulator (“One Connection Media”) users must obtain self-created and privately used backup copies of rightfully owned physical video game cartridges for use with the One Media SNES Emulator. Any such copies used with the One Media SNES Emulator must comply with permitted personal copies made in accordance with 17 U.S.C. § 117(a)(1). Any video game software copies made for use with or by the One Media SNES Emulator shall not be distributed to others, online or otherwise. This product is not affiliated with, nor authorized, endorsed or licensed in any way by Nintendo Corporation, its affiliates or subsidiaries. Nintendo game software sold separately. Nintendo© are trademarks or registered trademarks of Nintendo Corporation. All rights reserved. Company and product names are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective companies. All brands/names/images/etc are copyrighted by their respective owners. Images are shown for documentation purposes only. One Connection Media is not affiliated with, nor authorized, endorsed or licensed in any way by software/hardware companies. One Media Super NES Emulator does not include any Super Nintendo / Super Famicom game softwares. We do not warrant compatibility with all Super Nintendo games.

Medical Health Tracker Log allows you to log Doctors, Doctor Visits, Health Issues and Medications. Add patients (family members, friends, or whomever you need medical information for), then add doctors, log doctor visits, health issues (health log), & medications. Application Function Features include: Adding patients (enough to add all your family and friends). Patient section includes contact info. Health Log section includes Date and Comments. Doctor section includes Name, Address (optional), Phone # (optional) and Specialty (optional). Doctor Visits section Doctor, Date, Reason For Visit (optional) , Comments (optional). Medications section includes Name, Purpose (optional), Prescribe Date (optional), Dose Count (optional).

Pet Medical Log Tracker App lets you track your Pet's Medical information and history. Add pets, add Vets, log Vet visits, health issues, & medications ( drugs - prescriptions ). The Pet Medical Health Tracker Log app is the perfect solution for logging all your Pet's Medical needs. Fast, Easy to use screens lets you enter all the information that helps keep you pet happy and healthy.

Ghost Detector is an application that uses your mobile device sensors to detect sources of variable magnetic emissions. Which could indicate us the presence of some kind of paranormal activity. Ghost Detector is the only app that shows the distance between the paranormal activity and you. Also shows the magnetic field variations. It will not show magnetic fields at constant frequencies such as those generated by electronics, for example: TV, routers, computers, chargers, mobile phones, etc. The application will show a green dot on the radar in case there is nearby a source of magnetic emission. The detection range varies between 0 and 30 feet approximately, depending on the mobile device used.

Sé parte de lo mejor del entretenimiento en México desde tu celular. No pierdas detalle de fechas, inmuebles, preventas y promociones de los conciertos y espectáculos a presentarse próximamente en tu ciudad. En esta primera versión podrás: * Consultar la cartelera completa de conciertos y espectáculos de OCESA. * Tener a detalle la información de las fechas y horarios de los eventos, así como del inmueble en donde se llevarán a cabo. * Conocer anticipadamente las fechas de preventa Banamex para adquirir tus boletos . * Enlazarte directamente a Ticketmaster México para comprar tus entradas a los conciertos y espectáculos de tu interés. * Informarte de las promociones especiales que tenemos para los usuarios registrados de nuestro sitio ocesa.com.mx * Buscar por artista, fecha o inmueble el espectáculo de la cartelera OCESA de tu preferencia. * Compartir con tus amigos la información de nuestros eventos a través del correo y redes sociales (Facebook y Twitter). * Crea tu propio calendario de eventos agregándolos a tus favoritos. * Los eventos incluyen gran contenido multimedia e información: videos, imágenes, ubicación del inmueble, fechas y precios. * También encontrarás las secciones: noticias, mensajes y alertas. * La aplicación incluye un lector de códigos QR.

app_name: Tie A Scarf and Shawl Lite
description: Our application includes the most popular ways to tie scarves and shawls. It contains 20 free knots for beginners. ASCOT BANDIT BIEDERMEIER BOW Coco Chanel DOUBLE_ASCOT DOUBLE KNOT WRAP EIGHT KNOT FAKE_KNOT FOUR-IN-HAND French KNOT French Twist (Kurfurstendamm) LOLA LOOP&TUCK MADAM_JUSTICE NECK TIE SIMPLE 1 SIMPLE 2 SIMPLE 3 WESTERN Scarves are garments made of warm and decorative fabrics. They are often worn around the neck for warmth during cold, rainy, dusty or other types of inclement weather. They can also often be worn for more fashionable motives by style-minded people, even if the weather does not particularly require extra warmth or protection from the elements. Along with these elective reasons, in some cultures scarves are worn for religious and cultural reasons. scarves range in size from very long or wide models, to small thin types of scarves often known as "neckerchiefs" or "ascots." Traditional scarves when unraveled can stretch to 5 feet or more, ranging in thickness from 6 to 8 inches. A smaller scarf of the neckerchief variety can be as small as a regular bandana or head scarf. Depending on how they are worn and how many time a wearer chooses to wrap the scarf around her body, the length of the scarf can be cut in half or even into thirds.

Fire engine red is an intense, bright red commonly used on emergency vehicles in the United States; mostly on, as the name implies, fire engines. Most traditional older fire departments in larger U.S. central cities of major metropolitan areas use this color for their fire engines, but many smaller cities and also many suburbs now use the color chartreuse yellow for their fire engines because of its supposed greater visibility at night. Some departments have a mix of both. An ambulance is a vehicle for transportation of sick or injured people to, from or between places of treatment for an illness or injury, and in some instances will also provide out of hospital medical care to the patient. The word is often associated with road going emergency ambulances which form part of an emergency medical service, administering emergency care to those with acute medical problems. The term ambulance does however extend to a wider range of vehicles other than those with flashing warning lights and sirens, including a large number of non-urgent ambulances which are for transport of patients without an urgent acute condition and a wide range of vehicles including trucks, vans, bicycles, motorbikes, station wagons, buses, helicopters, fixed-wing aircraft, boats, and even hospital ships. description: Description Truckers Route Pay App is a program to help tractor trailer drivers manage their daily trip pay The app will allow you to enter your daily miles times the miles percent being paid. You also have the following buckets of trucker’s pay scales. TL = Truck loads LTL = Less then truck load DH = Drop & Hook Sec Out = Second pull Two fields that can be manually changed is “MILES & PAY AMOUNT” for what your contract pays Once all the fields are entered, you can hit the calculate button and this will generate your pay per line entry. If there is an error in one of the fields that need changing, just hit the “Clear” button and start over again. Once all fields are entered correctly, click on the “Grand Totals” button. This will show you what you made for that given day. This is a great tool if your company is using and onboard system like QUALCOMM, XATANET, PEOPLENET.

Dies erfordert dann natürlich eine Internetverbindung. In che anno... ?? è un gioco molto semplice il cui obiettivo è rispondere a delle domande con un anno. Infatti le domande iniziano sempre con "In che anno.." seguite da una avvenimento storico a volte famoso, altre volte no. Al momento le domande non sono moltissime, ma al raggiungimento dei primi 1000 download verrò rilasciato un aggiornamento con 50 domande nuove. Per qualsiasi incorrettezza o consigli contattatemi via mail. How long ...? is a very simple game whose goal is to answer questions with a year. In fact, the questions always begin with "In what year .." followed by a historical event sometimes famous, sometimes not. At the time the questions are not very many, but the achievement of the first 1000 downloads released an update will come with 50 new questions. For any incorrectness or advice please contact me via email.

View weather maps for the UK and Europe from the excellent Wetterzentrale website on your android device. Supports the major weather models, GFS, ECMWF and UKMO plus GEFS ensemble diagrams, GFS meteograms and FAX charts. Set the stored location used for GFS ensembles and meteograms either by using the device's location sensors or by placename lookup. Navigate to the next or previous chart or skip directly to any chosen hour. Animate any chart series. The buttons on ensembles and meteogram screens are: "Model" - change the model being displayed. "Set to Current Location" - set the stored location to that reported by the device's location sensors (GPS/Wifi). "Set Location to" - set the stored location by doing a placename lookup on the name entered in the text box below. "Show on map" - launch google maps showing the stored location. This feature is provided to verify the placename lookup was as expected. The buttons on weather map screens are: "Model" - change the model being displayed. "Chart" - change the chart type within the current model. "Skip to" - go directly to a selected hour within the current chart series. Additionally prev/next buttons navigate forward and backward through the series and play/stop buttons turn animation on and off. Future development: Zoom controls on displayed charts.
release_text: V1.1 - Fix lack of GFS chart updates. - Add GFS CAPE charts. - Remove broken link to USAF Fax.

In front of you are 49 numbers. Choose your 6 lucky numbers by pressing the ball. To discard the selected number, press again. Choose a bet stake (with a + / -), press play and enjoy the live drawing. 40 Numbers will be randomly drawn. The goal is to hit all 6 selected numbers. The sooner your 6 numbers are drawn, the more money you make (as much as it says next to the number). Through the drawing you can see the expected probability of winning. There exists the opportunity of selecting drawing speed, vibration and sound effects. There is also a Google text-to-speech that reads drawn numbers (if your mobile supports it). It is possible to monitor frequency of each number and credit movements through history. Enjoy and have fun :)

description: Con esta app aprenderas a interpretar una analítica básica, qué significa cada parámetro y qué patologías se asocian generalmente con el aumento o la disminución de cada uno de ellos. Además añadimos los valores de referencia para que puedas estudiar todas las analíticas que desees. La analítica la dividimos en dos partes, una de ellas corresponde al hemograma y la otra a la bioquímica clasica. With this you will learn to interpret basic analytical app, what each parameter and what diseases are usually associated with the increase or decrease in each. Also add the reference values ​​to be able to study all analytical we want. The analytical divide it into two parts, one of which corresponds to the CBC and the other classical biochemistry.

description: Juegos de lectura para niños/as de entre 3 a 5 años. Es la continuación de ' Aprender a Leer 1 ' y ' Aprender a leer 2 '. (también disponibles de manera gratuita). Se practica la lectura de palabras que engloban las sílabas practicadas en las dos primeras apps de 'Aprender a Leer', añadiendo sílabas inversas. Es decir, se trabajan sílabas simples con las letras M, P, L, S, N, Ñ, T, D, J e Y, a las que se añaden las sílabas inversas de la S, la L, la N y la M. Se trabaja con letra enlazada, que es la que mejor entienden los niños porque es la que se trabaja en los colegios. Esta es una ventaja con respecto a otras aplicaciones para móviles, que muestran el tipo de letra por defecto del móvil, y por tanto son menos educativas: la mejor letra para aprender a leer es la enlazada que se aprende en la escuela y es la que esta app ofrece. Reading games for children / as between 3-5 years. It is the continuation of 'Learning to Read 1' and 'Learning to read 2'. (Also available for free). Reading words that encompass practiced syllables in the first two apps for 'Learn to Read' is practiced, adding reverse syllables. Ie single syllables is working with letters M, P, L, S, N, N, T, D, J and Y, to which the inverse syllables of S is added, the L, N and M . It works with linked letter, which is best understood by children because that is what works in schools. This is an advantage over other mobile applications, showing the default font mobile, and therefore are less educational: the best lyrics of learning to read is the bound is learned in school and is the this app offers.

Chinese chart baby gender prediction is based on the Chinese lunar calendar, a chart developed over 700 years ago and discovered in a royal tomb in Beijing, China. The original is now shown at the Beijing Institute of Science. Obviously, the scientific value of the test is low. There are rumors that this gender prediction table is over 90% accurate when it is used properly. However, according to a 1999 survey, the accuracy rate is below 75 percent. Regardless of their scientific value, for entertainment purposes is a fun table. Want to try it? Just indicate the age of the mother at conception and the month of conception, this app will calculate your moon age, check China Chart and ... Will it predict the sex of your baby?

*A Portion Of All Proceeds Is Donated To The Shriners Hospital For Children. Thank You!* The "Call Of The Wild" on your phone! The nation's most popular big game has recently been discovered to be quite a vocal animal. Snorts, grunts, and bleats make up the majority of the deer's communication. Making the correct call at the right time is key to luring in wild deer. The rhythm, inflections, and tones must be accurate. The GForce Deer Call Generator reproduces nine of the most common vocalizations deer use to communicate. All sounds have been optimized for maximum volume and sound quality without distortion to provide an optimum deer hunting experience. To increase the range beyond your android device's capabilities, use an external amplified speaker (use carefully, since calling too loud can be interpreted by deer as yelling!) Master the sounds as you practice your manual deer call, fine tune your deer calling by mimicking the electronic deer call in the field, or use the deer call recordings to lure deer in close (check state game laws for legal use). This app is a deer hunter's "must have" and adds a practical tool to the deer hunter's calling system. An on-screen quick reference guide is provided below each deer call with quick, easy to read instructions for each call's optimum frequency and time of use during pre-rut, rut, and post rut. Novice or expert, the GForce Deer Call Generator lets you make the right call at the right time, every time. Nine must-have calls in a single app: 1. Buck Grunt 2. Buck Bawl 3. Doe Contact Call 4. Doe Grunt 5. Doe Bleat 6. Doe Estrus Bleat 7. Doe Breeding Bellow 8. Fawn Bleat 9. Fawn Distress Helps both the novice and seasoned hunter call in game. When it's time to call, scroll to the sound you want and push the corresponding button. Easy one-hand operation keeps movement to an absolute minimum. Great for downwind calling or when trying to precisely position a buck for a perfect shot. All the advantages an electronic deer call can offer are yours with the GForce Deer Call Generator.
release_text: v1.1.3: Minor performance enhancements. v1.1.2: Added Fawn Bleat and Fawn Distress. v1.1: Minor performance enhancements. v1.0: First Official Release.

Heden PTZ Controller is a Pan & Tilt Control app to control your Heden Ip camera. This app is especially useful if you stream from your camera viewing via vlc player. You can then easily control your camera with your mobile phone and watch video on a different screen. You have 2 ways to control your camera in this app. The first PTZ control method is without camera image and the second PTZ control method with a snapshot image. The snapshot refresh time can be adjusted in milliseconds. You can also play the stream from the camera in different resolutions 176*144, 320*240 and 640*480. View a snapshot in the browser and open VisionCam (external app) in resolutions 176*144, 320*240 and 640*480. Look at the camera's log, status, configuration and reboot the camera. Heden PTZ Controller supports the following models of heden cameras heden ip camera's V 2.2 CAMHED04IPWB CAMHED04IPWN CAMHED04IPB CAMHED04IPN heden ip camera's V 3.3 CAMH04IPWE heden ip camera's V 5.5 CAMHED05IPWN CAMHED05IPWB CAMHED05IPB CAMHED05IPN heden ip camera's V 6.1 CAMH06IPWE This app is not made by Heden and they are not involved in the development of this app.

HttpReadyNas is a handy and fast app for exploring your ReadyNAS http shares. Designed for the ReadyNAS Duo v1, to explore and download your files on a read-only share. This app has to work on all ReadyNAS sparc systems like, ReadyNAS NV + v1, ReadyNAS Duo v1 and ReadyNAS 1100. I developped this app because my Android phone always fails to download from my ReadyNAS Duo v1 in the default browser. If you ever have had the same problem then this app is your solution! • With support for up to 5 http shares. • Protect app with a password. • Explore your files and folders in a quick list view. • See file properties such as file name, content-type, size and modification date. • Download your files to a specified folder on your internal sd storage. • Open file after downloading, If file type is not recognized, you can try to open the file as text, image, video or audio. • Share button to quickly share a url to the file. • App startup option, open app in last opened share. • More options visible when one of the following file managers is installed: AndExplorer, ES File Explorer, OI File Manager or Blackmoon File Browser • No advertising or other junk and no information is sent back! This app is not made by NETGEAR. This app was created by Michael Letsch. This app has been tested only on the ReadyNAS Duo v1 and is still in beta version, if you have comments or suggestions for this app please leave a comment.

With oversized numbers for better visibility and a clear voice, this app is very useful for every RC pilot functions: * Screen stays on * To set the number of minutes timer start talking * Pause,and reset button with speech * Clear and big numbers * Uses Google Text-to-speech for speech * Dark background for better visibility and battery saving * Languages supported: English To use Quad Timer talking timer on your Android device, go to Settings > Language & Input > Text-to-speech output. description: Check whether your router might be vulnerable to attack through the UPnP protocol with the tool from Rapid7. The protocol UPnP lets computers, printers, and other devices make themselves easily discoverable to a network router. But new research by the security firm Rapid7 shows that it could also let hackers easily discover and exploit those routers, too. And the problem is “universal,” indeed: A wide-ranging scan of the Internet show that it affects as many as 50 million unique devices. With this app you can test your router and determine whether it is vulnerable to attack.

With this tool you can create a list of items from the code of a web page. The app works pretty simple, Gives a start and end text and make a list of items of what's in between. You can use this app to create lists of, for example, urls, images, videos, tags, code, youtube urls and so on. *List of demo tags so that you can see what you can do with this tool *Create list type: numbered, line spacing or comma separated list *Include start text in list item. *Include end text in list item. *See code of the page to quickly determine the start and end text. *Share the list via, email, Google Drive, SMS or WhatsApp If you're not looking for a way to create a list of something on the web then this app is not worth downloading.

description: App for the multiplication tables practice from 2 times table to 9 times table. Ask multiplications at random to examine the knowledge of the tables. Also subtract 5 points. It uses voice synthesis to ask and to give the result. If you are wrong, it tells you what was the correct answer. description: The Art of Public Speaking Audio by Dale Carnegie and Joseph B. Esenwein, is a manual for people who have to speak in public, and it is still in use today. The book describes how to make effective use of one’s voice and gestures, how to gain and convey confidence in front of a large audience, and which methods to use to convert the listeners to one’s own cause. Each chapter contains examples and a list of practice exercises. The last 15 sections are real speeches by famous men to function as a study aid. This app is a basically a convenient bookmark that opens your browser and allows you to listen to The Science of Getting Rich audiobook without having to download the file to your device. Includes ability to control volume, pause, rewind and forward.

app_name: The Futsal Laws of the Game
description: Futsal is one of the fastest growing sports in the UK, this is a guide to get you started and to ensure you know the laws. It has various features which include: -17 laws of the game -FIFA Twitter integration -Futsal Forum -Various Media (Send in your media via email to add it) -ToolBox (Cards, timer and score) -Developed by a Senior County Referee- Wiki 'Futsal' Futsal (Portuguese pronunciation: [futsal]) is a variant of football that is played on a smaller field and mainly played indoors. Its name comes from the Portuguese futebol de salão, which can be translated as "hall football". During the sport's second world championships held in Madrid in 1985, the Spanish name fútbol sala was used. Since then, all other names have been officially and internationally changed to futsal. It was developed in Brazil and Uruguay in the 1930s and 1940s. In Brazil futsal is played by more people than football but does not attract as many spectators as the outdoor sport. Several futsal players have moved on to careers as successful professional football players. Futsal is a game played between two teams of five players each, one of whom is the goalkeeper. Unlimited substitutions are permitted. Unlike some other forms of indoor football, the game is played on a hard court surface delimited by lines; walls or boards are not used. Futsal is also played with a smaller ball with less bounce than a regular football due to the surface of the pitch. The surface, ball and rules create an emphasis on improvisation, creativity and technique as well as ball control and passing in small spaces. Also see the football laws of the game guide.

description: Health first! In My Ideal Weight - BMI Calculation, make sure to be within optimal parameters of weight for height. Simple interface and easy to use. The body mass index (BMI) is an international measure used to calculate whether a person is at the ideal weight. It was developed by polymath Lambert Quetelet in the late nineteenth century. It is a fast and easy method for assessing the level of fat each, ie, is an international predictor of obesity adopted by the World Health Organization (WHO). description: If you enjoy puzzles you’re going to love Number Link! Get ready to spend endless hours of enjoyment along your phone or tablet with this fun puzzle game. Also known as Arukone, playing this exciting puzzle is very simple: connect the pairs of numbers without leaving any empty square on the board. Sounds easy but it’s really puzzling, so don’t underestimate this brain teaser. Number Link is a real challenge! Join more than two million players from all over the world. Download Number Link now and find out why everybody loves and plays this fun and addictive puzzle game. With over 800 different levels, with board sizes ranging from 5x5 up to the mind blowing 16x16 ones, Number Link is a great game to help you sharpen logic and reasoning skills whether you’re a beginner or an experienced puzzler. Just pick some puzzles and let the time flow! HOW TO PLAY Choose a Number Link stage and start connecting pairs of numbers on the board. Be careful not to overlap the lines or you will interrupt the flow between them. The solution for each stage is achieved when all the pairs of numbers are correctly connected and all of the squares of the board have been filled. HIGHLIGHTS • Over 800 handmade levels • Easy and difficult puzzles • Different board sizes • Hints in case you get stuck • Global leaderboards Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

Available for all screen resolutions and devices, including tablet device! Simple and intuitive! Vehicles for Toddlers is a nice game for toddlers and kids from ages 0-10. description: The film of your life. Imagine a movie that includes every day of the rest of your life… FEATURED on: Fast Company, MASHABLE, CNN, TED, BBC, & many more. We believe in try before you buy. The App is FREE for 30 days. If you like your experience, it's only $0.99 to continue :) For over 3 years now, I've been recording 1 second every day, so I'll never forget another day ever again. This project has had such a profoundly positive impact on my life, that I've passionately developed an App that will make it extraordinarily easy for anyone to do this too. Reliving every single day of my life at age 30 in 6 minutes has provided me with a treasured perspective on life. It holds me accountable for making each day count. When I turn 40, I'll have a 1 hour compilation that encapsulates my 30s. If I live to see 80 years of age, I'll have a 5-hour video that summarizes 50 years of my life. Features: + The App accesses any videos recorded on your phone & sorts them by date. You can also record your moment directly from the App. + Setup friendly reminders so you never forget a day! + Keep multiple timelines! You could have one for yourself… for each of your kids… your dinner… what you wear every day… etc! Looking forward to endless creative interpretations! + Backup your seconds with Google Drive! + Compile any given amount of time desired—the last month, year, or just select a start and end date. + Post your compilations directly to your social networks. + Your seconds are privately held on your phone. You never have to share this with anyone if you don't want to. The primary purpose of this App is to help you remember your own life. Sharing is optional.

The Nationwide Mobile Banking app makes it even easier to stay in control of your finances. It lets you quickly and easily check your balances and recent statements, move money between your Nationwide accounts and pay existing payees. Exclusively available to our Internet Bank customers, you can register and log in to the Mobile Banking app using your existing Internet Bank details. We're experiencing some intermittent issues with the mobile banking app. Please be assured that we are investigating the following and are working on a fix. Thank you for your continued patience. Android operating system 5.0 and above · Making a future dated payment Nexus 6 · Display issue **Features** With the Nationwide Mobile Banking app you can: · View recent current account, savings, credit card and mortgage transactions & statements · Send and receive money securely using the Paym service · View your savings interest rates · View your personal loan balance · Manage your current account overdraft · Transfer money between your Nationwide accounts · Make payments to existing payees, now or on a future date · View and cancel Direct Debits and Regular Payments · Open Instant Access, Limited Access and Fixed Term savings accounts, and a range of Cash ISAs · Check your balance on your Android Wear Smartwatch by - opting into automatic daily balance alerts, or - requesting your balance on demand by saying "OK Google, Start Quick Balance", or - swiping through the menu on the SmartWatch ** App permissions ** When you install the app, you may notice it asks you for permission to access your phone's device & app history. This is a standard Android permission that the smartwatch feature uses to retrieve the balance from your device. The permission is only used if you opt into Quick Balance, and we *do not* use this permission to obtain any other data from your device. To use the app you’ll need: · To be registered for Nationwide Internet Banking · To download the app · To log in using your Internet Banking credentials including; your customer number, memorable data and passnumber or card and card reader. Once you’ve registered, you’ll only need your Internet Banking passnumber to log in. If you’re not yet a registered Internet Bank user, simply go to nationwide.co.uk/internetbanking and follow the on screen instructions to register. Once you’ve received your log in details, you’ll be able to download and use the Mobile Banking app. To check your balance on your Android Wear Smartwatch you'll need: · Android 4.3 or higher on your mobile phone · An Android Wear powered Smartwatch · To opt in to Quick Balance via the Mobile Banking app Staying safe Nationwide uses the latest security technologies to ensure that our customers are safe and secure when using the app. Our digital promise means that you’ll never lose a penny if we find you’re a victim of fraud whilst using Nationwide’s Internet or Mobile Banking services. There are still a few things you can do to help protect yourself when using the app: · Never share your log in details with anyone · When logging on in a public place, be careful to keep your details out of sight · Create a password or PIN to access your device For details of the full promise visit nationwide.co.uk and browse to the Mobile Banking Security section. Important information We won’t charge you for using this app but your mobile operator may charge you for some services such as data exchange, so please check with them. Terms and conditions for the Nationwide Mobile Banking app can be found at nationwide.co.uk under ‘Mobile Banking’. Contact us For details of how to contact us, please visit nationwide.co.uk and browse to ‘Contact us’.
release_text: • Paym - You can now send and receive money securely, using just a mobile phone number. Paym lets you send and receive money securely to friends, family and others using just a mobile phone number. No account numbers and no sort codes they don’t even need to be banking with Nationwide. Just as long as they’re signed up to use the service. Remember that in order to use the Paym service in the Mobile Banking app you need to sign up using Internet banking.

app_name: A History of the United States
description: A HISTORY OF THE UNITED STATES BY CECIL CHESTERTON WITH AN INTRODUCTION BY G. K. CHESTERTON The author of this book, my brother, died in a French military hospital of the effects of exposure in the last fierce fighting that broke the Prussian power over Christendom; fighting for which he had volunteered after being invalided home. Any notes I can jot down about him must necessarily seem jerky and incongruous; for in such a relation memory is a medley of generalisation and detail, not to be uttered in words. One thing at least may fitly be said here. Before he died he did at least two things that he desired. One may seem much greater than the other; but he would not have shrunk from naming them together. He saw the end of an empire that was the nightmare of the nations; but I believe it pleased him almost as much that he had been able, often in the intervals of bitter warfare and by the aid of a brilliant memory, to put together these pages on the history, so necessary and so strangely neglected, of the great democracy which he never patronised, which he not only loved but honoured. Read more...

description: This application enables you to calculate the interest incurred on any amount such as capital investments or loans. It allows the user to calculate the following types of interests: ● Simple Interest ● Compound Interest This application makes it relatively easy to compute the simple interest as well as compound interest by simply entering the values. The compound interest can be computed in different ways depending upon the compounding basis such as: ▪ Monthly ▪ Quaterly ▪ Annually So, no more need to remember tricky and lengthy formulae for calculating interest. With 'Interest Calculator', save more time and avoid lengthy calculations. Remember 'Time Is Money'.

Wired Equivalent Privacy (WEP) is a security algorithm for IEEE 802.11 wireless networks. This application enables you to genarate a WEP key for your wireless network. The strength of the key can be chosen by the user such as: ● 64-Bit ● 128-Bit ● 256-Bit This application makes it relatively easy to use a WEP key for your wireless network without having to enter it manually. In addition to WEP keys, the application also allows the user to generate WPA keys for better and enhanced protection.

The Strong Password Generator allows you to create random passwords that are highly secure and extremely difficult to crack or guess due to an optional combination of lower and upper case letters, numbers and punctuation symbols. Hint: Including numbers and punctuation in a mixed case password will generally create a more secure password, which would be exponentially harder to recover using a brute force password discovery method.

It’s been almost a year since the release of the first version of Cmoar VR Cinema. Fully satisfied, we’d like to proudly put the newest update in your hands - an update that changes the application beyond recognition. Cmoar Cinema key features: - Dynamic Lighting - LAN connection - All video formats support ( .mp4/.mkv/.avi/.mov/.ogg/ etc.) - Watching Youtube videos (1080p 2D) - Watching Youtube videos (1080p 3D) - 3D interface - Chromatic aberration correction - Auditorium variations - Automatic downloading of subtitles and posters - Possibility to add every movie to Favorites - Multitude of various settings (eg. FOV) - New 3D camera - Voice search - „Last-viewed” option Soon: - Seat selection - Gamepad support Cmoar VR Cinema gives you a whole range of possibilities. Apart from displaying the movies from your memory card, you can also display a video from your PC in any format you wish thanks to LAN connection. That’s not the end of good news. To make things even more exciting, we’ve added an option of automatic subtitles and posters downloading. The most distinctive feature is, however, the possibility to watch 2D and 3D movies directly from YouTube. We prepared for you youtube tutorials that should help you to resolve drift and LAN video streaming problems. We do hope you will find these videos helpful :) Drift Correction Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eiqOViYncww ) LAN video streaming Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KZs3_-GeCNQ ) Thanks for your support. Enjoy the app! :-)
release_text: - Dynamic Lighting - LAN connection - All video formats support ( .mp4/.mkv/.avi/.mov/.ogg/ etc.) - Watching Youtube videos (1080p 2D) - Watching Youtube videos (1080p 3D) - 3D interface - Chromatic aberration correction - Auditorium variations - Automatic downloading of subtitles and posters - Possibility to add every movie to Favorites - Multitude of various settings (eg. FOV) - New 3D camera - Voice search - „Last-viewed” option

description: Poosh ® is a game that recreates the excitement once, generated the Tamatgochi. For lovers of virtual pets, Poosh brings a world where they can move freely and enjoy now. Poosh is become your new friend, taking care prevents his death. Enter this new adventure and get ready for the arrival of an online world with your friends. Poosh is comming here to stay!
release_text: En Poosh® estamos trabajando para que el mundo sea online y puedas disfrutar jugando con tus amigos ya sea en equipo o luchando entre ustedes!. Poosh esta creciendo y junto a él tus deseos de que poosh se convierta en el juego mas utilizado de Android. No pares de invitar a tus amigos para que se sumen a Mundo Poosh!

description: Speed and Cunning, do you have what it takes? Avner is a game in which the player is a character named Avner, a hero trapped in a strange world and captured by a traveling circus. Luckily for him, he have some control over gravity and is able to create small power sources that can affect him or his environment. This is a 2D platform action-puzzle game in a 3D environment, similar to games such as Little big planet and Trine in its game mechanics but involves a puzzle part at its core. The game combined two main elements: The first one is a fast pace game that requires dexterity and speed The second element is a puzzle resolution game, in which the player has to figure out a solution and try at it until he overcomes the obstacle. Credits: Developed By : Doron Weiss and Gil Elnekave Published by: Corbomite Games (Executive Producer: Oded Sharon)
This is a platformer called Teakni, you play as a totally black player who is just trying to get to the goal of every level as usually

Download this FREE application and you’ll be on the leading edge of citizen crime prevention. Not only will you be promoting a safer community for your family and friends but also you may be entitled to receive a cash reward for your tip submissions! Since 1981, Metro Denver Crime Stoppers has been serving the community and Law Enforcement by providing a conduit for anonymous tips provided by the public to assist Law Enforcement. MDCS has paid out over $600,000 in awards and assisted Law Enforcement in arresting thousands of criminals. With this new technology the user has the ability to: • Send a video or photograph for easy tip submission. • Find the nearest police station using GPS and receive turn by turn directions. • Check the status of submitted tips. • View Metro Denver’s “Most Wanted”. • One touch calling directly to a Crime Stoppers Representative. • One touch email composition to submit an email tip. • View Metro Denver’s “Crime of the Week”. • Connect with Metro Denver’s Crime Stoppers Social Media Pages. • Receive notifications about crime related incidences in your community; including AMBER and MEDINA Alerts. Metro Denver Crime Stoppers collects none of your personal information. Your tips are completely anonymous. You are provided with a unique user name and password and the app collects your “Push Message” ID so you can receive real time alerts about your submitted tips. We don’t collect any of your contact information! If you like our App and would like to see your city develop something similar, contact your local Crime Stoppers Program and let them know about us! Please support the Metro Denver Crime Stoppers Mobile Application and use the share feature to spread the word about the App in your community!

Have you ever imagined what the inside of your mobile device looks like? Ever wondered how applications work? More specifically...what does your anti-virus do? What goes on during those idle scans? Well join A.v.a.'s virus fighting team and take on the role of V.E.P. as he delves deep into your device's various sectors. Use your wits and perception to scan for viral contamination and other system issues as you roll through an intriguing 3D world of circuitry! NOTE: This is a VERY short demo version!! Crowe Gaming is made up of a small team of three hobbyist game developers that started learning around April 2014! This Circuit Roller Demo is their first mobile app game! Keep this in mind as you play and be sure to give them a rating and feel free to contact them at crowegaming@live.com ! This will help them to improve their work and be able to bring more enjoyable games to the app market! Also please check out their website at crowegaming.com Thank you!

Desk Clock Plus is the full featured version of the stock android clock program for your phone or tablet. While keeping the original look and feel of the 2.x stock version by displaying the battery level, current time, your local weather, Desk Clock Plus allows you to configure it for your needs whether that is a clock for your office or night stand. Almost all aspects of the clock can be configured. You can configure the background to rotate from images from a specific folder on your device, from albums from your Google Photo account or from the featured images from Google. You can also choose not to select a background and let your active wallpaper show though, or you can also download and select various themes (see the ‘Robot’ images) or create your own theme. You can also change the font colors, display a 12 or 24 hour clock or set the phone to silent when it’s docked. Desk Clock Plus' settings will allow you to choose if you launch a screen saver into the night clock mode or in to a slide show screen saver of the images you choose. Optionally, you can purchase an extension that will allow you to add additional buttons docks and choose your own applications to launch from Desk Clock Plus. Swipe left and right on the dock or on the time and weather to re-arrange the layout. You can also swipe the time and weather panels to reconfigure the clock's layout. Desk Clock Plus is the best application to use for your multimedia dock!

description: Plan, Explore and Share! Ditch that heavy tome and replace it with My Hong Kong Guide, a virtual guide to one of the world’s most exciting destinations. Why? Because it will allow you to: Make a guide that’s yours You get to make the Hong Kong guide you want with thousands of attractions, restaurants and shops in Hong Kong to pick from. Travel light Access, update and edit your guide online from your mobile or PC, anytime, anywhere. Plan with friends Build your Hong Kong guide with your travel buddies. Get inspired See what other travellers are doing, shake your phone to get Hong Kong travel ideas or check what’s happening around you. Go offline Download the app content to your phone and do your travelling offline. Get rewards Add some extra fun to your trip by collecting stars around Hong Kong to earn badges and bragging rights! Make your friends jealous Let the folks back home see what you are up to by sharing your travel journal and photos on social media. And … Photo Fun: Get silly by adding fun stencils to your photos with themes based on Hong Kong icons, local attractions and events. Discover Hong Kong Tourist SIM card: Get the most out of My Hong Kong Guide (and your phone) with this card, which includes mobile data, discounted international calls and updates on the latest promotions and offers in town.
